analyzed: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma sbyin no //
translated: Then, one should give the outer bali.

original: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang mar gyi spyin sreg snga ma bzhin du byas la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang mar gyi spyin sreg snga ma bzhin du byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the burnt offerings of Vajrayakṣa, Vajra Fire, and clarified butter as before,

original: thab kyi dbus su rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba yid kyis bkod la yi ge h'um gis mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
analyzed: thab kyi dbus su rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba yid kyis bkod la yi ge h'um gis mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul bar bya'o //
translated: in the center of the hearth one should mentally arrange the maṇḍala of Vajra-Aṅgāra, and with the syllable hūṃ one should offer one hundred and eight burnt offerings of clarified butter.

original: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i snying pos sbyin sreg lan bdun bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje mtshon cha 'dzin ma la sogs pa'i snying pos sbyin sreg lan bdun bya'o //
translated: Then, with the essence mantras of Vajra-Aṅgāra, Vajra-Aṅkuśa, and so forth, one should perform seven burnt offerings.

original: de nas me tog dor la dkyil 'khor de h'um zlos shing bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu bya'o //
analyzed: de nas me tog dor la dkyil 'khor de h'um zlos shing bri ba'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu bya'o //
translated: Then, having cast the flower, one should merge the maṇḍala with the maṇḍala to be drawn, reciting hūṃ.

original: de nas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la /
analyzed: de nas phyag 'tshal ba sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung la /
translated: Then, having made prostrations beforehand, one should take up the vows.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a bo dhi tsitta autp'a da a'a mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin du byang chub tu sems chen po bskyed pa byas la su ra ta stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas de bzhin du
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a bo dhi tsitta autp'a da a'a mi zhes bya ba la sogs pa de bzhin du byang chub tu sems chen po bskyed pa byas la su ra ta stvam ho badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes bya bas de bzhin du
translated: In that way, having generated the great mind of enlightenment, with suratasatvaṃ hoḥ vajra siddhi yathā sukhaṃ,

original: rang gi snying gar rdo rje bskyed la shar sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la h'um dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te badzra badzra karma mu ka
analyzed: rang gi snying gar rdo rje bskyed la shar sgor bltas nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la h'um dang rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs te badzra badzra karma mu ka
translated: in that way, having generated the vajra in one’s heart, looking at the eastern door, having empowered oneself with the water of the vase located outside, with hūṃ and the formation of the Hūṃkāra vajra mudra, having taken up the flower garland with that,🔽one should recite vajra vajra karma mukuṭāya namah, śrī vajra rāga samaya namah, khaṭvāṅga vajra pra la pra ra namah, śrī vajra ghaṇṭa cala ya namah,

original: ra ya na ma: shri badzra r'a ga sa ma ya na ma: kha tv'am ga badzra pra la pra ra na ma: shir badzra ganha tsa la ya na ma: zhes brjod de dkyil 'khor du zhugs la rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i snying po yang brjod cing rdo rje
analyzed: ra ya na ma: shri badzra r'a ga sa ma ya na ma: kha tv'am ga badzra pra la pra ra na ma: shir badzra ganha tsa la ya na ma: zhes brjod de dkyil 'khor du zhugs la rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i snying po yang brjod cing rdo rje
translated: and having entered the maṇḍala, one should recite the essence mantra of Vajrāṅkuśī and the vajra

original: lcags kyu mas bdag nyid bkug par bsam par bya'o //🔽yang lho sgo nas rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po yang zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje zhags pa mas bdag nyid bcug par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: lcags kyu mas bdag nyid bkug par bsam par bya'o // yang lho sgo nas rdo rje zhags pa ma'i snying po yang zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje zhags pa mas bdag nyid bcug par gyur par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Imagine that the Vajra Hook one has summoned oneself.🔽Again, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra noose, enter in the same way through the southern door. Imagine that the Vajra noose one has caused oneself to enter.

original: de nas nub sgo nas rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i snying po zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje lcags sgrog mas bdag nyid bcing bar bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas nub sgo nas rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'i snying po zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje lcags sgrog mas bdag nyid bcing bar bsam mo //
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Bell, enter in the same way through the western door. Imagine that the Vajra Bell one has bound oneself.

original: yang byang sgo nas rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje dril bu mas bdag nyid dbang du byas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yang byang sgo nas rdo rje dril bu ma'i snying po zlos shing de bzhin du zhugs la rdo rje dril bu mas bdag nyid dbang du byas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Again, reciting the essence mantra of Vajra Bell, enter in the same way through the northern door. Imagine that the Vajra Bell one has brought oneself under control.

original: yang de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Again, enter in the same way through the eastern door, and then say this:

original: ma h'a su ra ta su tri dha su to sho me su su kho badzra sa tva @313b aadya si dhya m'am /
analyzed: ma h'a su ra ta su tri dha su to sho me su su kho badzra sa tva @313b aadya si dhya m'am /
translated: Mahasuratasutridhasutoshomessukhovajrasatvadhyasidhyam.

original: de nas khros pas rdo rje gsor zhing khro gnyer dang bcas pas bya'o //
analyzed: de nas khros pas rdo rje gsor zhing khro gnyer dang bcas pas bya'o //
translated: Then, with wrath, one should brandish the vajra, with a frown and wrath.

original: de bzhin khro bos gdul bya la /
analyzed: de bzhin khro bos gdul bya la /
translated: Thus, for disciples to be tamed by wrath,

original: rdo rje bsnyems pa 'chang 'gyur nas //🔽rdo rje h'um mdzad sdigs mdzub ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bsnyems pa 'chang 'gyur nas // rdo rje h'um mdzad sdigs mdzub ni //
translated: one should assume the vajra conceit,

original: yi ge h'um gis rab tu spyar //
analyzed: yi ge h'um gis rab tu spyar //
translated: and with the syllable hūṃ,🔽one should employ the vajra hūṃkāra threatening gesture.🔽May the great vajra holder rejoice,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen dgyes gyur cig / gdug pa gdul bas rab tu dgyes //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen dgyes gyur cig / gdug pa gdul bas rab tu dgyes //
translated: delighting in the taming of the wicked.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas la /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor bskor ba lan gsum byas la /
translated: Then, one should circumambulate the maṇḍala three times,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste de kho na nyid lan cig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du 'dug ste de kho na nyid lan cig brjod par bya'o //
translated: and in front of the Blessed One, one should recite the truth once.

original: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che /
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che /
translated: Great desire, great bliss,

original: rdo rje chen po nor che ba /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po nor che ba /
translated: great vajra, great wealth,

original: ye shes chen po las che ba //
analyzed: ye shes chen po las che ba //
translated: great gnosis, great action,

original: rdo rje sems sogs ding grub mdzod ;
analyzed: rdo rje sems sogs ding grub mdzod ;
translated: accomplish the vajra mind and so forth.

original: / yang 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: / yang 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: One should also say this:

original: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhi m'am /
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: pra siddhi m'am /
translated: jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ prasiddhaṃ.

original: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la g-yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma'i rdo rje phye la h'um aa zhes lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i chu 'thungs la g-yon pa khro bo'i khu tshur gyis sems ma'i rdo rje phye la h'um aa zhes lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then, having drunk the vajra water, one should cause the descent of the awareness beings upon oneself, reciting “Hum Ah” one hundred times, while opening the mind-lotus with the left fist-vajra.

original: de nas h'um gis me tog dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas h'um gis me tog dor bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with that very “Hum,” one should cast the flower.

original: de nas h'um de nyid kyis blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas h'um de nyid kyis blangs la rang gi mgo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken it up with that very “Hum,” one should bind it to one’s head.

original: de nas yi ge h'um zlos shing gdong g-yogs bcings pa las bkrol la h'um zhes brjod de /
analyzed: de nas yi ge h'um zlos shing gdong g-yogs bcings pa las bkrol la h'um zhes brjod de /
translated: Then, reciting “Hum,” one should untie the blindfold from one’s eyes, and say “Hum.”

original: mig gnyis su rdo rje bkod la /
analyzed: mig gnyis su rdo rje bkod la /
translated: Having placed a vajra in both eyes,

original: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: he badzra p'a shya zhes bya bas dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
translated: one should view the maṇḍala, saying “Hevajra pādya.”

original: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with “Tiṣṭha vajra” and so forth, one should release the entrance seal at one’s heart.

original: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor te shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bstod nas de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa mchod pa bzhi'i khro bo dang bcas pa dang
analyzed: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor te shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa bstod nas de nas 'dod chags rdo rje ma la sogs pa mchod pa bzhi'i khro bo dang bcas pa dang
translated: Then, with the wrathful ones and the four offerings such as the passion vajra,

original: glu dang gar rol mo'i mchod pas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: glu dang gar rol mo'i mchod pas kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa yang dag par mchod la /
translated: and with the offerings of song, dance, and music, one should make perfect offerings to the Bhagavat with retinue.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma shar sgor bltas pa bris nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar pa'i phyag rgya chen po padma der 'dug la mchod yon blangs te dri dang me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du sna tshogs padma shar sgor bltas pa bris nas rdo rje me ltar 'bar pa'i phyag rgya chen po padma der 'dug la mchod yon blangs te dri dang me tog la sogs pas bdag nyid mchod la /
translated: Having drawn a multicolored lotus facing the eastern gate inside the outer mandala, one should sit on that lotus in the great mudra of the blazing vajra fire, receive the water for welcoming, and make offerings to oneself with fragrance, flowers, and so on.

original: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
analyzed: khro bo'i khu tshur gyis rnam par rgyal pa'i bum pa las chu blangs la /
translated: Then, having taken up water with the wrathful fist from the victorious vase,

original: h'um aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod cing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
analyzed: h'um aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa zhes brjod cing des bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya zhing chu de btung bar yang bya'o //
translated: Saying Hum Om Vajra Abhishiñca one should confer initiation upon oneself and drink that water.

original: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje phreng ba'i @314a * //
analyzed: de nas sangs rgyas lnga'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya dang rdo rje phreng ba'i @314a * //
translated: Then, with the seal of the initiation of the five Buddhas and the initiation of the vajra garland,

original: dbang bskur la phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur la phyi rol gyi sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan dang rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: one should confer the initiation of the outer crown of the five Buddhas and the initiation of the vajra garland.

original: de nas yi ge gnyis kyi cho gas go bgos la rdo rje thal mos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das las blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yi ge gnyis kyi cho gas go bgos la rdo rje thal mos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba bcom ldan 'das las blang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having been armored with the rite of the two syllables, having saluted the Bhagavat with the vajra palms together, one should take the initiation of the vajra, the lord, and the name from the Bhagavat.

original: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid la mchod de /
analyzed: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs la mchod pa rnam pa lnga dang rdo rje mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis bdag nyid la mchod de /
translated: Then, having taken the vow of the vajra conduct for the sake of power, one should worship oneself with the five offerings and the twelve offerings of the seals, such as Vajra Weapon.

original: de kho na nyid dang chos dang dril bu dang / dam tshig bzung la tshigs su bcang pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pa thob pa dang rang gi snying po dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la de las de dag mnos nas yang bdag byin gyis
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang chos dang dril bu dang / dam tshig bzung la tshigs su bcang pa lngas rjes su gnang ba dang gzengs bstod pa dang lung bstan pa thob pa dang rang gi snying po dang phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la de las de dag mnos nas yang bdag byin gyis
translated: Having taken the vows of the five families, the five permissions, the encouragement, the prophecy, one’s essence, and the gnosis of the four seals, one should bow to the Bhagavat, take them from him, and then perform the self-consecration.

original: brlabs pa dang / 'di ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
analyzed: brlabs pa dang / 'di ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas brjod byas nas /
translated: Having done the recitation as desired in this way,

original: bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de phyir dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la me tog la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de phyir dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: one should make offerings to the Bhagavat with flowers, and so on, and then depart.

original: slob dpon las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon las kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The extensive rite of the master is complete.

original: // / de nas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do //
analyzed: // / de nas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do //
translated: Then the extensive rite of inducting the disciples, and so on, is explained.

original: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings la //
analyzed: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings la //
translated: Having bound the vajra-drinking water,

original: bsam pa g-yos par gyur pa yis //
analyzed: bsam pa g-yos par gyur pa yis //
translated: one should sprinkle the disciples with the thought in motion.

original: mgo bo legs par btung gyur pas //
analyzed: mgo bo legs par btung gyur pas //
translated: Having sprinkled the head well,

original: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed //
translated: one should accomplish all powers.

original: zhugs nas dkyil 'khor bskor nas ni //
analyzed: zhugs nas dkyil 'khor bskor nas ni //
translated: Having entered, circumambulated the maṇḍala,

original: lan gsum byas te 'di skad brjod //
analyzed: lan gsum byas te 'di skad brjod //
translated: and done it three times, one should say this:

original: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
translated: “Great desire, great bliss,

original: 'gro ba kun kyang 'grub par mdzod //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun kyang 'grub par mdzod //
translated: accomplish all migrating beings!”

original: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
analyzed: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
translated: Then, with the offering of the time,

original: bde ba chen po yang dag mchod //🔽de bzhin rdo rje'i dbang bskur la /
analyzed: bde ba chen po yang dag mchod // de bzhin rdo rje'i dbang bskur la /
translated: great bliss is truly offered.🔽Likewise, having taken the disciple

original: slob ma blangs te 'jug par bya //
analyzed: slob ma blangs te 'jug par bya //
translated: and conferred the empowerment of the vajra,

original: de la slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su blang pa 'am //
analyzed: de la slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su blang pa 'am //
translated: there, having taken the five bases of training of the disciple,

original: dge sbyong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung bas rig pa'i sngom pa blangs la /
analyzed: dge sbyong gi sdom pa yongs su bzung bas rig pa'i sngom pa blangs la /
translated: or having taken the vow of the ascetic through taking the vow of the vidyādhara,

original: slob dpon la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: having bowed to the master, one should say this:

original: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas /
analyzed: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas /
translated: “Great joy, you, my teacher,

original: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
translated: you, Master, please consider me.🔽I seek the great lord,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa /🔽mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo //🔽dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa / mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo // dam tshig de nyid stsal du gsol //
translated: the one who reveals the way of the bodhisattva.🔽Please grant me the reality of the pledge.

original: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
analyzed: sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol //
translated: Please grant me the vows.”

original: de nas gnod spyin gyi khro bo yongs su bzlas pa'i ras sngon @314b po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs byas nas /
analyzed: de nas gnod spyin gyi khro bo yongs su bzlas pa'i ras sngon @314b po'i stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs byas nas /
translated: Then, having made a topknot and a lower garment out of the cloth completely enchanted with the Yakṣa-yakṣiṇī mantra,🔽he should cover his face with a blue cloth completely enchanted with the Vajra-yakṣa and the four door-guardians mantras, and put on a garland of flowers, and make his mouth fragrant.

original: yang rdo rje gnong sbyin dang sgo srung bzhi yongs su bzlas pa'i dar sngon pos gdong g-yogs la me tog gi phreng ba btags shing kha dri zhim par byas la phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba dang // sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: yang rdo rje gnong sbyin dang sgo srung bzhi yongs su bzlas pa'i dar sngon pos gdong g-yogs la me tog gi phreng ba btags shing kha dri zhim par byas la phyag bzhi sngon du 'gro ba dang // sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: Then, having made him prostrate four times, he should make him take the vow.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub gyi sems chen po bskyed du bcug la de bzhin du de'i snying gar rdo rje bskyed nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la yon gyi mchog blangs te rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub gyi sems chen po bskyed du bcug la de bzhin du de'i snying gar rdo rje bskyed nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid dbang bskur la yon gyi mchog blangs te rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis
translated: Then, having generated the great thought of enlightenment as before, he should generate the vajra in his heart as before, and having conferred empowerment on himself with the water of the vase located outside, he should take the best of gifts.

original: brlabs la / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
analyzed: brlabs la / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la /
translated: Having blessed himself as Vajra-hūṃkara, he should have him hold a garland of flowers with the Vajra-hūṃkāra mudra.

original: slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho gas rdo rje shugs kyis gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho gas rdo rje shugs kyis gzhug par bya'o //
translated: One should cause them to enter by the ritual of the master’s entrance, with the vajra impulse.

original: de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la rdo rje shugs ni 'di yin te /
translated: The vajra impulse is as follows:

original: bdag nyid rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: bdag nyid rdo rje sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the yoga of the vajra self,

original: rdo rje rdo rje zhes smras pa /
analyzed: rdo rje rdo rje zhes smras pa /
translated: one says “vajra vajra,”

original: kun du 'gro ba grub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: kun du 'gro ba grub pa'i phyir //
translated: in order to accomplish the universal,

translated: Then, Bhagavān should be consecrated as the subduer of all the wicked, all māras, and all the three realms.

original: de nas khro bo'i las bzhi po rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / bsad pa dang / 'ching bar bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nas khro bo'i las bzhi po rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / bsad pa dang / 'ching bar bya ba ste /
translated: Then, one should train in the four wrathful activities: sealing, destroying the seal, killing, and binding.

original: khro bo'i las bzhi bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i las bzhi bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train in the four wrathful activities.

original: phyag rgya gang zhig ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: phyag rgya gang zhig ces bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: The mudra who...

original: tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: is accomplished in this very life.

original: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: Thus it is to be stated.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byin par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'du ba la sogs pa dbugs 'byin par bya'o //
translated: Then, the disciples should be encouraged with the gathering of all the Tathagatas, and so forth.

original: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so /
translated: The extensive ritual procedures for the master's work and the disciple's entrance, and so forth, are complete.

original: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa gsungs nas /
translated: Having thus stated the extensive ritual procedures for the master's work and the disciple's entrance, and so forth,

original: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa las kyi rgyun sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams
analyzed: da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don 'di bstan par bya ba'i phyir de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa las kyi rgyun sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rnams
translated: now, in order to teach the meaning of the master should instruct those who have obtained the commitments and empowerment in the wisdom of spiritual powers, the practice of the mudras that accomplish the continuum of action

original: gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: gsungs pa yin no //
translated: is stated.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag tu don ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de ma thag tu don ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: The word then indicates the immediate teaching of the meaning.

original: sgrub pa chen po byas nas gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur na de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: sgrub pa chen po byas nas gang gi tshe grub par ma gyur na de'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: If one does not succeed in the great practice, then immediately after that.

original: dngos grub ma grub ces bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa phyag @316b rgya bzhis sngar bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas bsgrubs pas na dbang du byas par ma gyur pa de ni ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub ma grub ces bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgyal sogs pa phyag @316b rgya bzhis sngar bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas bsgrubs pas na dbang du byas par ma gyur pa de ni ma grub pa'o //
translated: Not succeeding in the powers means that one has not succeeded in the powers of the Dharma seal, etc. by the practice with the four seals as previously explained, and so has not brought them under control.

original: des dngos grub bsgrub pa na 'grub pa yin la ma bsgrubs pas na ma grub pa'o //
analyzed: des dngos grub bsgrub pa na 'grub pa yin la ma bsgrubs pas na ma grub pa'o //
translated: If one does not succeed in the powers, then one should practice the powers.

original: las kyi rgyun zhes bya ba ni las rnams kyi rgyun te /
analyzed: las kyi rgyun zhes bya ba ni las rnams kyi rgyun te /
translated: The stream of actions is the stream of actions.

original: thams cad bsreg pa la sogs pa'i las kyi rgyun rnams so //
analyzed: thams cad bsreg pa la sogs pa'i las kyi rgyun rnams so //
translated: The stream of actions is all the actions of burning, etc.

original: las kyi rgyun de'i dam pa ni mchog go //
analyzed: las kyi rgyun de'i dam pa ni mchog go //
translated: The best of that stream of actions is the supreme.

original: su zhig gi zhe na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: su zhig gi zhe na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje khro bo ni rdo rje rigs kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: Whose? The supreme vajra wrathful one is said. The vajra wrathful one is the nature of the vajra family.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: The best of those is the supreme.

original: rdo rje khro bo mchog kyang yin rgyal po yang yin pas na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mchog kyang yin rgyal po yang yin pas na rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po ste /
translated: He is the supreme vajra wrath, and also a king, thus he is the supreme vajra wrathful king.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One is the Vajra like Fierce Fire.

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba ste /
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba ste /
translated: The word “only” indicates a restriction.

original: rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo'i rgyal po nyid do //
translated: He is the supreme vajra wrathful king.

original: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas so //
analyzed: go rims bzhin du zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i bsgrub pa'i cho gas so //
translated: “In order” means according to the previously explained ritual of practice.

original: rab bshad ces bya ba ni rab tu phye ste bshad pa'o //
analyzed: rab bshad ces bya ba ni rab tu phye ste bshad pa'o //
translated: “Explained” means explained by analysis.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te gang gi tshe sngar bshad pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur te gang gi tshe sngar bshad pa'i sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas /
translated: This shows that when one has performed the previously explained preliminary service,

original: zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub pa na 'grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe 'og nas rjes thogs nyid la 'chad pa'i sgrub pa'i las brgya po bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas te chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub pa na 'grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe 'og nas rjes thogs nyid la 'chad pa'i sgrub pa'i las brgya po bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and at the full moon one recites all night and practices the Dharma seal, etc., and if one does not achieve [mastery], then at that time one will achieve the one hundred ritual actions explained immediately following, merely by reciting them.

original: thams cad bsreg pa la ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad bsreg pa ni thams cad bsreg pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad bsreg pa la ni zhes bya ba ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad bsreg pa ni thams cad bsreg pa'o //
translated: In all burning means that all moving and unmoving things are burned, that is, all burning.

original: bskrad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: bskrad pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: Driving away and so forth are easy to understand.

original: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How are all these things done?

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung bas so //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis so zhes bya ba gsungs te rdo rje h'um mdzad las byung bas so //
translated: It is said by Vajrahūṃkāra, that is, by one arisen from Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: de yang ske tshe dang bcas pa'i nyungs mar gyi sbyin sreg g-yas pas bya ba dang de nyid kyis thams cad bcing ba dang mi 'gul ba nyid dang gnyid log par ston pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas bsdigs pa dang / phyag rgya lhod par bya ba dang /
analyzed: de yang ske tshe dang bcas pa'i nyungs mar gyi sbyin sreg g-yas pas bya ba dang de nyid kyis thams cad bcing ba dang mi 'gul ba nyid dang gnyid log par ston pa dang / khro bo'i rdo rje'i lta bas bsdigs pa dang / phyag rgya lhod par bya ba dang /
translated: Moreover, it is taught that all of this is done by the right hand, with the burnt offering of mustard seed with asafoetida, and by that same [hand] all are bound, immobilized, and put to sleep, and threatened with the gaze of the Wrathful Vajra, and the seal is loosened.

original: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar bya ba'i mtshams dbye ba dang / de dag nyid kyis gdu bur bcing ba dang / bcings te btsir ba dang / de nas dral ba dang / g-yas nas brdeg pa dang / mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba dang / g-yas pa'i gung mo 'gyed pa'i @317a * //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis sbyar bar bya ba'i mtshams dbye ba dang / de dag nyid kyis gdu bur bcing ba dang / bcings te btsir ba dang / de nas dral ba dang / g-yas nas brdeg pa dang / mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba dang / g-yas pa'i gung mo 'gyed pa'i @317a * //
translated: struck from the right, the two fingers are joined,🔽the right middle finger is extended,🔽the two fingers are blazing,🔽the two fingers are bared and bound,🔽the two hands are rubbed,🔽all the fingers are scattered,

original: tshul dang / mdzub mo 'bar ba dang / bcang ba dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis sen mo bcer te bcing ba dang / lag pa gnyis mnye ba dang / sor mo thams cad du gtor ba dang / mod la phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
analyzed: tshul dang / mdzub mo 'bar ba dang / bcang ba dang / mdzub mo gnyis kyis sen mo bcer te bcing ba dang / lag pa gnyis mnye ba dang / sor mo thams cad du gtor ba dang / mod la phyag rgya dgrol ba dang /
translated: the mudra is immediately released,🔽and for one shivering with cold, the threatening mudra is made.🔽The right finger is extended and the threatening mudra is made,🔽the right hand is held to the mouth,

original: grang bas 'dar ba la sdigs mdzub bya ba dang / g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs kar byas nas sdigs mdzub bya ba dang / g-yas pa sos bzung ba dang / dra ba dang / dgod pa dang / rgyug pa la sogs par ston pa dang /
analyzed: grang bas 'dar ba la sdigs mdzub bya ba dang / g-yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs kar byas nas sdigs mdzub bya ba dang / g-yas pa sos bzung ba dang / dra ba dang / dgod pa dang / rgyug pa la sogs par ston pa dang /
translated: a net, laughter, running, and so forth are shown,

original: mdzub mo gnyis su se gol gtogs pa'o //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis su se gol gtogs pa'o //
translated: and the two fingers snap.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /🔽snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te / snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: This is the teaching:🔽As before, one should perform the yoga of Vajra-fierce-fire.

original: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
translated: One should hold the vajra

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //🔽dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya // dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: and ring the dharma-bell.🔽Having consecrated the great seal with the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
translated: one should recite the essence-mantra.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji skad bshad pa'i sbyin sreg gi thab khung gi gnas su legs par bzhugs su gsol te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa hi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la g-yas pas blugs gzar blangs te
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das ji skad bshad pa'i sbyin sreg gi thab khung gi gnas su legs par bzhugs su gsol te cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad pa hi h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la g-yas pas blugs gzar blangs te
translated: Then, in the place of the fire-pit of the sacrifice as explained, one should request the Blessed One to sit well, and having performed all the rites, one should recite “hi hūṃ” and form the seal of Vajra-hūṃ-kāra, and taking the ladle with the right hand,

original: / yungs mar skye tshe dang bcas pa'i sbyin sreg bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i phung po 'dra ba'i zhal du yid kyis gzhug par byas te /
analyzed: / yungs mar skye tshe dang bcas pa'i sbyin sreg bya zhing bsgrub par bya ba yang bcom ldan 'das bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i phung po 'dra ba'i zhal du yid kyis gzhug par byas te /
translated: one should perform the sacrifice of mustard seed with salt, and one should mentally cause the one to be subdued to enter the mouth of the Blessed One, who is like a mass of blazing fire at the end of an eon.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad bsreg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad bsreg par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, everything will be burned.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te bsgrub par bya ba bskrad pa'i bsam pas mdzub mo gnyis kyis gtong ba ltar byas te bsgrub par bya ba yang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis rtsa bzhin du
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te bsgrub par bya ba bskrad pa'i bsam pas mdzub mo gnyis kyis gtong ba ltar byas te bsgrub par bya ba yang rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis rtsa bzhin du
translated: Likewise, having performed the yoga of Vajra Blazing Fire, one should bind Vajra Humkara, and with the intention of expelling the victim, one should toss one's two index fingers, as if tossing the victim, and the victim is tossed by the vajra wind mandala, as if by a root.🔽

original: khyer bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: khyer bar bsam par byas te /
translated: Likewise, having performed the yoga of Vajra Blazing Fire, one should bind the Vajra Humkara, and with the two index fingers imagine that one is expelling the victim, and one should imagine that the victim is carried away by the wind mandala of the vajra.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas bcings te bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yid kyis zhugs te bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig tu smra mi nus par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad skrod par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgyas bcings te bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la yid kyis zhugs te bsgrub par bya ba'i tshig tu smra mi nus par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag
translated: By this, all will be expelled.🔽Likewise, having performed the yoga of Vajra Blazing Fire, one should bind the Vajra Humkara, and having mentally entered the body of the victim, one should imagine that the victim is unable to speak, and one should imagine that one binds one’s own mouth with the two index fingers of the Vajra Humkara

original: rgya mdzub mo gnyis kyis bdag nyid kha bcing bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: rgya mdzub mo gnyis kyis bdag nyid kha bcing bar bsam par byas te /
translated: mudra.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad gzhig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad gzhig par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all will be bound.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor @317b la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mnan par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba'i steng du dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor @317b la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mnan par bsam par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, having performed everything, one should imagine that Vajrahūṃkāra tramples upon the maṇḍala of the great empowerment above the one to be subdued.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad rengs so //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad rengs so //
translated: By this, all are paralyzed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas la bsgrub par bya ba gnyid log tu gzhug pa'i bsam pas mig 'dzums pa byas te de lta bus thams cad gnyid log par 'gyur ro
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te yid kyis bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas la bsgrub par bya ba gnyid log tu gzhug pa'i bsam pas mig 'dzums pa byas te de lta bus thams cad gnyid log par 'gyur ro
translated: Likewise, having performed everything, having bound Vajrahūṃkāra, having imagined that the one to be subdued is together with the one to be subdued, one should close one’s eyes with the thought that the one to be subdued is put to sleep. By this, all are put to sleep.

original: // de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la khro bo'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la blta zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub byas la mig las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar bas kyang /
analyzed: // de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la khro bo'i lta bas bsgrub par bya ba la blta zhing mdzub mo gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub byas la mig las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar bas kyang /
translated: Likewise, having bound Vajrahūṃkāra, one should look at the one to be subdued with an angry gaze, and having made the threatening gesture with the two index fingers, one should burn the one to be subdued with the blazing vajra that arises from one’s eyes.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bar mtshams med par khyab par bsam par byas te de lta bus ni thams cad rgyas 'debs so //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i lus la bar mtshams med par khyab par bsam par byas te de lta bus ni thams cad rgyas 'debs so //
translated: Having imagined that the body to be accomplished is pervaded without interval, by that, all are sealed.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas te bsgrub par bya ba rmongs par bya ba'i bsam pas phyag rgya lhod par byas te de lta bus ni thams cad rmongs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la bsgrub par bya ba dang lhan cig tu byas te bsgrub par bya ba rmongs par bya ba'i bsam pas phyag rgya lhod par byas te de lta bus ni thams cad rmongs so //
translated: Similarly, having formed the Vajrahūṃkāra, having made the one to be accomplished together with oneself, having loosened the seal with the thought of stupefying the one to be accomplished, by that, all are stupefied.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba gzir ba'i bsam bas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun gzhibs la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi gzhig pa'i bsam pas so sor byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba gzir ba'i bsam bas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mdzub mo gnyis phan tshun gzhibs la dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi gzhig pa'i bsam pas so sor byas te /
translated: Having done everything in that way, having imagined the one to be accomplished to be oppressed, having crossed the two index fingers of Vajrahūṃkāra, having imagined the destruction of the four-branched army, having done each,

original: de lta bus ni thams cad 'jig go //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad 'jig go //
translated: by that, all are destroyed.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba bcing pa'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis gdu bur bcing bar byas la bsgrub par bya ba yang rdo rje lcags sgrog gi khro bos bcing bar bsam bar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba bcing pa'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis gdu bur bcing bar byas la bsgrub par bya ba yang rdo rje lcags sgrog gi khro bos bcing bar bsam bar byas te /
translated: Likewise, having performed everything, with the intention of binding the victim, one should bind the two index fingers of the Vajrahūṃkāra mudra in the form of a bracelet, and one should imagine that the victim is bound by the wrathful Vajra-Aṅkuśa.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad bcing bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are bound.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba gzir ba'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu bcing pa'i tshul du byas la de btsir bar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bsgrub par bya ba gzir ba'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya mdzub mo gnyis gdu bu bcing pa'i tshul du byas la de btsir bar byas te /
translated: Likewise, having performed everything, with the intention of subduing the victim, one should make the two index fingers of the Vajrahūṃkāra mudra in the form of a bracelet and press them down.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad btsir bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad btsir bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are subdued.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bcings pa thams cad dral ba'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog tu bcings la dral bar byas te de lta bus ni thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la bcings pa thams cad dral ba'i bsam pas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya'i mdzub mo gnyis lcags sgrog tu bcings la dral bar byas te de lta bus ni thams cad dral bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, having performed everything, with the intention of releasing all bonds, one should bind the two index fingers of the Vajrahūṃkāra mudra in the form of a bracelet and release them. By this, all are released.

original: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba la bsnun pa'i bsam pas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo g-yon pa'i mthe chung la brdeg par byas @318a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du thams cad byas la rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings te bsgrub par bya ba la bsnun pa'i bsam pas g-yas pa'i mdzub mo g-yon pa'i mthe chung la brdeg par byas @318a * //
translated: Likewise, having done everything, one should form the Hūṃkāra mudra and, with the thought of striking the one to be subdued, one should strike the left ring finger with the right index finger.

original: te ; de lta bus ni thams cad brdeg par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: te ; de lta bus ni thams cad brdeg par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one strikes all.

analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad phye mar byas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la bdud kyi dpung la sogs pa rnams par gzhig pa'i bsam pas phyag rgya de mod la gya tshom du dgrol zhing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bdud kyi dpung rnam par 'joms par mdzad par bsam par byas te

analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad smyo bar byas par 'gyur ro //
