original: sngar bshad pa'i rims sel ba'i bsgom pa dang byams pa'i lta bas rims thams cad bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rims sel ba'i bsgom pa dang byams pa'i lta bas rims thams cad bsal bar bya'o //
translated: with the view of love as previously explained, one should remove all fevers.🔽Likewise, one should bind the Vajra Humkara and,

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la smin la smin ma 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis sbyar ba'i dug thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la smin la smin ma 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis sbyar ba'i dug thams cad bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: with the method of the eyebrows moving, one should remove all poisons.🔽Likewise, one should bind the Vajra Humkara and,

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la so ston par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po che gdon mi za ba'i lus la zhugs nas gdon za bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la so ston par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das khro bo stobs po che gdon mi za ba'i lus la zhugs nas gdon za bar bsam par byas te /
translated: with the intention that the Blessed One, the wrathful Mahabhairava, enters the body of the spirit and devours it, one should show the teeth.

original: de lta bus ni gdon bsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gdon bsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one removes the spirits.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phu zhes bya ba zlos shing bdag nyid klu zla ba'i mdog tu bsams la rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug gi sten du yi ge phu zla ba'i mdog can nyid bsam par bya zhing des sems can gyi lus
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phu zhes bya ba zlos shing bdag nyid klu zla ba'i mdog tu bsams la rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dug gi sten du yi ge phu zla ba'i mdog can nyid bsam par bya zhing des sems can gyi lus
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and while reciting “phu” imagine oneself as the color of the moon, and imagine the syllable phu, the color of the moon, in the location of the poison of the moving and unmoving poisons.

original: sam dug bdud rtsir byas par bsam par bya zhing /
analyzed: sam dug bdud rtsir byas par bsam par bya zhing /
translated: By that, imagine that the poison in the body of sentient beings🔽is transformed into nectar.

original: de lta bus ni dug thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni dug thams cad las thar par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will be liberated from all poisons.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byas shing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byas shing bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams te /
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and with that, make the gesture of raising a victory banner, and imagine oneself as Śrī Heruka.

original: des mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la bsnun par bya zhing me ltar 'bar bas kyang mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thal bar byas par bsams te /
analyzed: des mkha' 'gro mas zin pa la bsnun par bya zhing me ltar 'bar bas kyang mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thal bar byas par bsams te /
translated: With that, strike the one seized by the ḍākinīs, and imagine that the ḍākinī’s spell is reduced to ashes by the blazing fire.

original: de lta bus ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will be liberated from all ḍākinī spells.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings pa las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i tshul du byas shing phyag rgya bcings pa las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi phyung ste /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and with it make the gesture of raising a banner. From the formation of the seal, the four-branched army emerges.

original: des rang gi dpung yongs su bsrungs na /
analyzed: des rang gi dpung yongs su bsrungs na /
translated: If one protects one’s own army with this,

original: de lta bus ni g-yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni g-yul 'gyed pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: one will be liberated from all battles.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la 'jigs byed kyi lta bas khro ba dang bcas pas mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing phyag rgya bcings pa las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la 'jigs byed kyi lta bas khro ba dang bcas pas mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing phyag rgya bcings pa las dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa phyung ste /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and with the gaze of Bhairava, look with wrathful eyes wide open. From the formation of the seal, the four-branched army emerges.

original: des gzhan gyi dpung bcom par bsams na de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des gzhan gyi dpung bcom par bsams na de lta bus ni gzhan gyi dpung thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one imagines that it destroys the other army, in this way one will destroy all other armies.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings @322a * //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings @322a * //
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra,

original: la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing ji tsam mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs su bltas la mtshams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: la mig mi 'dzums par blta zhing ji tsam mngon par 'dod pa'i phyogs su bltas la mtshams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: and look with wide-open eyes in whatever direction one desires. One should bind the boundary.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying ga las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung nas des phyogs bcing bar bya'o //🔽de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya de bskor bar bya zhing de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying ga las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung nas des phyogs bcing bar bya'o // de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya de bskor bar bya zhing de lta bus ni dkyil 'khor bcing bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and having drawn out a blazing vajra from one’s heart, one should bind the directions with it.🔽Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and having rotated that seal, one should bind the maṇḍala with it.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas la yongs su bzlog nas mdzub mo'i rdo rje rtse mo'i spyi gtsug tu gzhag par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas la yongs su bzlog nas mdzub mo'i rdo rje rtse mo'i spyi gtsug tu gzhag par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and having joined the two index fingers and made a point, reverse it and place the vajra point of the index fingers on the crown of one’s head.

original: de lta bus ni shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: de lta bus ni shin tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: By that, one will be well protected.

original: / de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas la rang gi snying gar gzhag par byas te /
analyzed: / de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gzhibs te rtse mor byas la rang gi snying gar gzhag par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and having joined the two index fingers and made a point, place it at one’s heart.

original: de lta bus ni yongs su skyob par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni yongs su skyob par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that, one will be completely protected.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te rtse mor byas nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje dgrol bar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis gshibs te rtse mor byas nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje dgrol bar byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Great Vajra Hūṃkāra, and with the two index fingers side by side and pointed, release the vajra at one’s heart.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad thar bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad thar bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are released.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te phyag rgya thad kar bzhag nas bteg par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te phyag rgya thad kar bzhag nas bteg par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Great Vajra Hūṃkāra, and with the seal placed horizontally, lift it up.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad bslang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad bslang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are raised up.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo'i gdong phan tshun dam du sprad par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo'i gdong phan tshun dam du sprad par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Great Vajra Hūṃkāra, and with the faces of the index fingers tightly joined,

original: de lta bus ni thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are brought under control.

original: de ltar rdo rje khro bo chen po sna tshogs 'grub pa'i las bsgrub par gsungs nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje khro bo chen po sna tshogs 'grub pa'i las bsgrub par gsungs nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the accomplishment of the rite of the various accomplishments of the Great Wrathful Vajra,

original: da ni lha thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi las bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no//
analyzed: da ni lha thams cad ltung bar bya ba la ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyi las bsgrub pa gsungs pa yin no//
translated: now, in order to teach the accomplishment of the rite of the supreme accomplishment of the Victorious Great Wrathful Vajra, he says “For the downfall of all gods, etc.”

original: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /🔽lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung bar bya ba dang / 'og nas brdeg pa dang / yi ge h'um gis khros pa dang / 'jigs pas lta ba dang / khros pas rdo rje kha tv'am ga bcag pa dang / snying gar rdo rje bsgom pa dang /
analyzed: de nas 'di'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste / lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung bar bya ba dang / 'og nas brdeg pa dang / yi ge h'um gis khros pa dang / 'jigs pas lta ba dang / khros pas rdo rje kha tv'am ga bcag pa dang / snying gar rdo rje bsgom pa dang /
translated: Next, the characteristics of this [mudra] will be explained.🔽Looking up with the eyes, falling down, striking from below, wrathful with the syllable hum, looking with fear, breaking the vajra khaṭvāṅga with wrath, meditating on the vajra at the heart,

original: rdo rje rtse gsum pa bcag pa dang / yi ge h'um gis gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gtor ba dang / hi dang g-yas logs nas dbugs 'byung ba dang / de nyid kyis dong tshe gsor ba dang / de bzhin du khro bo'i lta bas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mnan la /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse gsum pa bcag pa dang / yi ge h'um gis gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gtor ba dang / hi dang g-yas logs nas dbugs 'byung ba dang / de nyid kyis dong tshe gsor ba dang / de bzhin du khro bo'i lta bas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mnan la /
translated: breaking the three-pointed vajra, destroying the mandala of the wicked with the syllable hum, exhaling from the right with hi, and with that, snapping the fingers, and likewise, pressing down with the right fist with a wrathful look,

original: g-yon pa'i sos bzung ba nas drang ba dang / dong tshe gnyis gsor ba dang / @322b g-yon pa'i dril bu bzhag pa dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis de bzhin du g-yas pa'i khu tshur g-yon pa'i khro bos mnan la rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' bkrol bar bsam pa dang /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i sos bzung ba nas drang ba dang / dong tshe gnyis gsor ba dang / @322b g-yon pa'i dril bu bzhag pa dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis de bzhin du g-yas pa'i khu tshur g-yon pa'i khro bos mnan la rdo rje khu tshur gyi mtha' bkrol bar bsam pa dang /
translated: Holding with the left hand, straightening,🔽shooting two arrows, placing the left hand bell,🔽and with Vajra Humkara, the right fist is pressed down by the left fist, and the end of the vajra fist is released.

original: g-yas pa'i dril bu bcag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar ltung ba dang / yid kyis 'khor lo dral ba dang rtse gsum dral ba dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yon dang g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mnan la de bzhin du mthar gdu bur dgrol bar bsam pa dang /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i dril bu bcag pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral bar ltung ba dang / yid kyis 'khor lo dral ba dang rtse gsum dral ba dang / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi g-yon dang g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis mnan la de bzhin du mthar gdu bur dgrol bar bsam pa dang /
translated: The right hand bell is struck, falling away from passion, mentally unravelling the wheel, unravelling the three tines, and with Vajra Humkara, the right and left fists are pressed down, and the end is released as before.

original: rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su dran pas mdun du bsgrub pa'o //
translated: The vajra, the bodhisattvas, all the tathagatas, and the great Vajradhara are accomplished in front through recollection.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: This teaches the following.

original: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i sbyor ba byas la /
translated: As before, perform the yoga of Vajra-fierce-fire.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
translated: Form the Vajra-humkara,🔽and with the gaze of a wrathful one, look down from above as if to strike down.

original: khro bo'i lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'i tshul du bya zhing lta ba las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba ltung bar byas par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'i tshul du bya zhing lta ba las byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang bsgrub par bya ba ltung bar byas par bsam par byas te /
translated: Imagine that the Bhagavat, arisen from the gaze, also strikes down the one to be subdued.

original: de lta bus ni lha thams cad ltung bar byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni lha thams cad ltung bar byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all gods will be struck down.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la /
translated: Form the Vajra-humkara,

original: de nyid kyis 'og nas brdeg pa'i tshul du bya zhing /🔽bcom ldan 'das phyag na lcags kyu bsnams te /
analyzed: de nyid kyis 'og nas brdeg pa'i tshul du bya zhing / bcom ldan 'das phyag na lcags kyu bsnams te /
translated: and with it, as if striking from below,🔽imagine that the Bhagavat, holding a hook in his hand,

original: klu rnams 'dren par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: klu rnams 'dren par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
translated: leads the nagas.

original: de lta bus ni klu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni klu thams cad 'byin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all nagas will be drawn out.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i yi ge h'um khro bo'i bsam pas bzlas shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje su spyod pa'i khro bos gnod sbyin bkug ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i yi ge h'um khro bo'i bsam pas bzlas shing bcom ldan 'das rdo rje su spyod pa'i khro bos gnod sbyin bkug ste /
translated: Likewise, having bound the Vajra Humkara, one should recite the syllable Hum, which is the follower of the yakshas, with the thought of wrath, and summon the yakshas with the wrath of the Blessed One, the Vajra Lord.

original: de lta bus ni gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gnod sbyin rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the yakshas will follow.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad de /🔽srin po mthong ba'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad de / srin po mthong ba'am /
translated: Likewise, the Vajra Humkara🔽should be bound, and one should look with a very frightening look at the rakshasa,

original: srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa la shin tu 'jigs pa'i lta bas lta zhing bzlas pas lta ba las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar bas srin po bcom par 'gyur par byas te /
analyzed: srin po'i gdon gyis zin pa la shin tu 'jigs pa'i lta bas lta zhing bzlas pas lta ba las byung ba'i rdo rje 'bar bas srin po bcom par 'gyur par byas te /
translated: or at one seized by the rakshasa-graha. By reciting, one should burn the rakshasa with the blazing vajra arisen from the look.

original: de lta bus ni srin po skrag par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni srin po skrag par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, the rakshasa will be frightened.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te /
translated: Likewise, the Vajra Humkara should be bound,🔽and one should look with a very frightening look at the vetala,🔽or at one seized by the vetala-graha. By reciting, one should burn the vetala with the blazing vajra arisen from the look.🔽By this, the vetala will be frightened.

original: bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing lta ba'i phyag rgya las 'bar ba'i rdo rje phyung la des mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje kha tv'am ga bcag par bsam par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka 'khor dang
analyzed: bdag nyid dpal he ru kar bsams la khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing lta ba'i phyag rgya las 'bar ba'i rdo rje phyung la des mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi rdo rje kha tv'am ga bcag par bsam par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka 'khor dang
translated: Imagining oneself as glorious Heruka, one should look with the gaze of wrath, and with the mudra of looking, one should imagine that a blazing vajra is drawn out, and that it shatters the vajra of the dakinis.

original: bcas pa mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa'i lus la zhugs pas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon rnams bsregs par gyur pa @323a * //
analyzed: bcas pa mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon gyis zin pa'i lus la zhugs pas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon rnams bsregs par gyur pa @323a * //
translated: The glorious Heruka, together with his retinue, enters the body of the one afflicted by the dakini spirit, and the dakini spirits and so forth are burned up.

original: ba dang / 'byer bar gyur par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: ba dang / 'byer bar gyur par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
translated: One should imagine that they are destroyed and scattered.

original: de lta bus ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, all spirits such as the dakinis are subdued.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bar ba bsgom zhing rdo rje 'bar ba las byung ba'i rdo rje rigs kyis dpung thams cad skrag par mdzad par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying gar rdo rje 'bar ba bsgom zhing rdo rje 'bar ba las byung ba'i rdo rje rigs kyis dpung thams cad skrag par mdzad par byas te /
translated: Similarly, one should bind the vajra hūṃkāra, meditate on a blazing vajra at one’s heart, and imagine that the entire army is frightened by the vajra family that arises from the blazing vajra.

original: de lta bus ni bdud kyi dpung thams cad bcom par byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni bdud kyi dpung thams cad bcom par byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will destroy all the hosts of Māra.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la dpal he ru ka ra bdag nyid du bsams te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la dpal he ru ka ra bdag nyid du bsams te /
translated: Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra and contemplated oneself as Śrī Heruka,

original: ma mo'i tshogs mthong ba dang / ma mo'i gdon gyis zin pa la dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya bcings pa las byung pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya rang bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum pa bcag par gyur cing ma mo'i tshogs khyab par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: ma mo'i tshogs mthong ba dang / ma mo'i gdon gyis zin pa la dpal he ru ka'i phyag rgya bcings pa las byung pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya rang bzhin rdo rje rtse gsum pa bcag par gyur cing ma mo'i tshogs khyab par bsam par byas te /
translated: when seeing the assembly of mātṛkās or when seized by the mātṛkā grahas, having bound the mudrā of Śrī Heruka, imagine that the mudrā of the assembly of mātṛkās is destroyed by the Bhagavān, becoming a three-pointed vajra.

original: de lta bus ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will subdue all the hosts of mātṛkās.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying ga nas khro bo stobs po che phyung ste /🔽des gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la rang gi snying ga nas khro bo stobs po che phyung ste / des gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor bar bsam par byas te /
translated: Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra, one should emit the wrathful Mahābala from one’s heart.🔽One should imagine that he scatters the maṇḍala of the wicked.

original: de lta bus ni gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gtor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one will scatter the maṇḍala of the wicked.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje 'bar ba spros la gdug pa thams cad kyi steng du dbab par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la h'um zhes bya ba las rdo rje 'bar ba spros la gdug pa thams cad kyi steng du dbab par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and with “Hūṃ” emit blazing vajras, and cause them to fall on all evildoers.

original: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gdug pa thams cad btul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all evildoers are subdued.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la h'um zhes bya bas khams gsum pa thams cad dbang du byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la h'um zhes bya bas khams gsum pa thams cad dbang du byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and with “Hūṃ” subjugate all the three realms.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad dbang du btul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad dbang du btul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, all are subjugated.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul gyis g-yas logs su bzhag cing rang gi snying las rdo rje'i rigs rnams phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul gyis g-yas logs su bzhag cing rang gi snying las rdo rje'i rigs rnams phyung ste /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra, and place it to the right side in the manner of granting fearlessness, and draw out the vajra family from one’s heart.

original: des bsgrub par bya ba rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las bzlog par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: des bsgrub par bya ba rgyal po'i 'jigs pa las bzlog par bsam par byas te /
translated: By this, imagine that the one to be liberated is freed from the fear of the king.

original: de lta bus ni 'jig pa med par yang dag par bskyod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni 'jig pa med par yang dag par bskyod par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one is truly shaken without being destroyed.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des dong tshe gyen du 'phen zhing gsor ba'i tshul du byas la bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzang po yang rnal 'byor pas rang dbang du bya bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la des dong tshe gyen du 'phen zhing gsor ba'i tshul du byas la bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzang po yang rnal 'byor pas rang dbang du bya bar bsam par byas te /
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and with it, as if throwing a dice, throw it upward and imagine that the Blessed One Sudarśana is brought under one’s control.

original: de lta bus ni nor bu bzang po dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni nor bu bzang po dbang du byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one will bring Sudarśana under one’s control.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la /
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra,

original: khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing zlos la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar @323b bas rnam thos sras las nor thams cad bsnams te byon par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas lta zhing zlos la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar @323b bas rnam thos sras las nor thams cad bsnams te byon par bsam par byas te /
translated: and with the gaze of wrath, recite and imagine that the Blessed Vajra-like-flame comes from Vaiśravaṇa, taking all wealth.

original: de lta bus ni rnam thos sras las nor thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rnam thos sras las nor thams cad 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one will take all wealth from Vaiśravaṇa.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur thad kar bzhag la g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur thad kar bzhag la g-yas pa'i khro bo'i khu tshur gyis bzung ste /
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and place the left vajra fist at the heart, and with the right wrathful fist,

original: lcags sgrog sbrel ba ma bkrol bar g-yon pa'i mdzub mos bzung nas drang bar bya zhing rnam thos sras kyi gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la /
analyzed: lcags sgrog sbrel ba ma bkrol bar g-yon pa'i mdzub mos bzung nas drang bar bya zhing rnam thos sras kyi gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la /
translated: Having pressed the image of Vaiśravaṇa with the left foot,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal phrogs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal phrogs te /
translated: one should imagine that the Blessed One has taken away his glory,

original: rnal 'byor pa la stsal bar bsam par byas te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la stsal bar bsam par byas te /
translated: and has given it to the yogin.

original: de lta bus ni rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal phrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal phrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one will take away the glory of Vaiśravaṇa.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis dong tshe gnyis 'phen zhing gsor ba'i tshul du ston cing yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdzub mo gnyis kyis dong tshe gnyis 'phen zhing gsor ba'i tshul du ston cing yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar byas te /
translated: Similarly, having bound the Vajrahūṃkāra, one should display the two forefingers as if throwing two dice, and imagine that one is in union with a celestial maiden of one’s choice.

original: de lta bus ni lha'i bu mo thams cad dang rtse par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni lha'i bu mo thams cad dang rtse par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this means, one will play with all the celestial maidens.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la gzhon nu ma'i lag pa g-yon na gnas pa'i dril bu rdo rje 'bar bas yid kyis bcug la gzhon nu ma dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la gzhon nu ma'i lag pa g-yon na gnas pa'i dril bu rdo rje 'bar bas yid kyis bcug la gzhon nu ma dang lhan cig yang dag par sbyor bar bsgom par byas te /
translated: Likewise, bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and imagine that the bell in the left hand of the maiden is penetrated by a blazing vajra. Meditate on union with the maiden.

original: de lta bus ni gzhon nu ma dang rtse bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gzhon nu ma dang rtse bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one plays with the maiden.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i gdod rang gi mthe bo'i steng du gzhag la 'og tu phab ste mdzub mo g-yon pas mnan te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings te g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i gdod rang gi mthe bo'i steng du gzhag la 'og tu phab ste mdzub mo g-yon pas mnan te /
translated: Bind the vajra hūṃkāra, and with the tip of the right index finger place the right thumb on top, and press down with the left index finger.

original: mthe'u chung gnyis kyis lcags skrog dral ba'i tshul gyis dbrog pa'i tshul du bya zhing rkang pa g-yon pas brgya byin gyi gzugs brnya ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis mnan la /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis kyis lcags skrog dral ba'i tshul gyis dbrog pa'i tshul du bya zhing rkang pa g-yon pas brgya byin gyi gzugs brnya ji skad bshad pa'i tshul gyis mnan la /
translated: With the two little fingers, make the gesture of unlocking the fetters, and with the left foot trample upon Śakra’s form, as explained before.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang bskal pa bsregs pa lta bu'i rdo rje lcags kyus bde sogs ma'i snying phug ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje me ltar 'bar bas kyang bskal pa bsregs pa lta bu'i rdo rje lcags kyus bde sogs ma'i snying phug ste /
translated: The blessed Vajra-like Blazing Fire, with a vajra hook that burns like the fire at time’s end, pierces the heart of Śakra.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon nas 'gugs par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon nas 'gugs par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
translated: Having mounted him on the wind mandala, imagine that he is drawn.

original: de lta bus ni brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma phrogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni brgya byin mnan nas bde sogs ma phrogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, Indra is suppressed and will not steal the bliss.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung ste /
translated: Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra, imagine that a blazing vajra is drawn out from the binding of the mudra.

original: gzhon nu ma'i lag pa g-yas pa na gnas pa'i dril bu yid kyis bcag par byas te /
analyzed: gzhon nu ma'i lag pa g-yas pa na gnas pa'i dril bu yid kyis bcag par byas te /
translated: Mentally strike the bell that is held in the right hand of the maiden.

original: de lta bus ni gzhon nu mtshar bcad par 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la yid kyis tshangs pa'i mdun du @324a * //
analyzed: de lta bus ni gzhon nu mtshar bcad par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la yid kyis tshangs pa'i mdun du @324a * //
translated: By this, the maiden will be subdued.🔽Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra, mentally emanate forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and objects of touch in front of Brahmā.

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya sprul la 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya sprul la 'dod pa'i longs spyod dang ldan par bsam par byas te /
translated: Imagine that he is endowed with the enjoyments of desire.

original: de lta bus ni tshangs pa ltung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni tshangs pa ltung ba byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, Brahmā will be brought down.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las 'bar ba'i rdo rje phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las 'bar ba'i rdo rje phyung ste /
translated: Likewise, form the adamantine Hum, and from the formation of the seal, the blazing vajra is drawn forth.

original: yid kyis khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dral bar byas te /
analyzed: yid kyis khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo dral bar byas te /
translated: Mentally, the wheel of Vishnu is split apart.

original: de lta bus ni khyab 'jug thul bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni khyab 'jug thul bar 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, Vishnu is subdued.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la phyag rgya bcings pa las rdo rje 'bar ba phyung ste /
translated: Likewise, form the adamantine Hum, and from the formation of the seal, the blazing vajra is drawn forth.

original: des dbang phyug chen po'i lag pa na gnas pa'i rtse gsum pa bcag par byas te /
analyzed: des dbang phyug chen po'i lag pa na gnas pa'i rtse gsum pa bcag par byas te /
translated: By this, the trident which is in the hand of Mahesvara is broken.

original: de lta bus ni dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, one is victorious over Mahesvara.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i gdong rang gi mthe bo'i steng du bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du bzhag nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis g-yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la de bzhin du mthar gdu bu dgrol
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la g-yas pa'i mdzub mo'i gdong rang gi mthe bo'i steng du bzhag la g-yon pa'i mdzub mo'i gdong yang de bzhin du bzhag nas g-yas pa'i khu tshur gyis g-yon pa'i khu tshur bzung la de bzhin du mthar gdu bu dgrol
translated: Likewise, form the adamantine Hum, and place the face of the right index finger on the tip of one's thumb, and likewise place the face of the left index finger, and with the right fist hold the left fist, and in the same way finally untie the bracelet.

original: ba'i tshul gyis bsal bar bya zhing //
analyzed: ba'i tshul gyis bsal bar bya zhing //
translated: and with the form of a lion, he should crush him.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas mnan par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu'i rdo rje lcags kyus dga' ba ma'i snying gar phyung ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gi gzugs brnyan rkang pa g-yon pas mnan par bya zhing bcom ldan 'das me ltar 'bar ba bsreg pa'i bskal pa lta bu'i rdo rje lcags kyus dga' ba ma'i snying gar phyung ste /
translated: Having crushed the image of the Lord of Desire, he should crush him with his left foot, and with the Blessed Lady blazing like fire, like the fire at the end of the eon, he should extract the heart of Rati with the vajra hook,

original: rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon nas 'gugs par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
analyzed: rdo rje rlung gi dkyil 'khor la bskyon nas 'gugs par mdzad par bsam par byas te /
translated: and he should imagine that she is drawn up onto the mandala of the vajra wind, and is brought.

original: de lta bus ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, having crushed the Lord of Desire, he should take Rati.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du rdo rje rtse lnga pa bsgom par byas te /
translated: Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra, he should visualize a five-pronged vajra in front of him.

original: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, he will accomplish the vajra.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen por bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du kun du bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen por bsgom par byas te /
translated: Similarly, having bound the vajra hūṃkāra, he should visualize the great bodhisattvas such as Samantabhadra in front of him.

original: de lta bus ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'grub bo //
analyzed: de lta bus ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'grub bo //
translated: In this way, he will accomplish the great bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad bcings la mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsgom par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra gesture and meditate on all the Tathāgatas in front.

original: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed do ;
analyzed: de lta bus ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed do ;
translated: By this, all the Tathāgatas are pleased.

original: / de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la mdun du rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgom par byas te /
analyzed: / de bzhin du rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya bcings la mdun du rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po bsgom par byas te /
translated: Likewise, form the Vajrahūṃkāra gesture and meditate on Great Vajradhara in front.

original: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su mnyes pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni rdo rje 'chang chen po rjes su mnyes pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By this, you will please Great Vajradhara, and you will accomplish summoning, inducting, binding by pledge, and controlling.

original: lan cig bzlas pa @324b grub pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rgyal po 'di dag 'grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni yi ge h'um zlos shing bcing bar byas la /
analyzed: lan cig bzlas pa @324b grub pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa las rgyal po 'di dag 'grub par byed pa'i phyag rgya ni yi ge h'um zlos shing bcing bar byas la /
translated: The siddhi of the one-time repetition, etc., are accomplished by the mudra that accomplishes these kings of rites.🔽Form the Vajrahūṃkāra gesture and recite the syllable hūṃ.

original: de'i 'og tu ni hri: zhes bya ba lhan cig sbyar bar byas te /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu ni hri: zhes bya ba lhan cig sbyar bar byas te /
translated: Then, add hriḥ.

original: hr'i: h'um zhes zlos pas dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: hr'i: h'um zhes zlos pas dngos grub thams cad sgrub par byed do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: By reciting hrīḥ hūṃ, one accomplishes all powers. This is the meaning.

original: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje me dang / nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: dpal mchog dang po'i rgya cher bshad pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje me dang / nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa bshad pa rdzogs so /
translated: This completes the explanation of the chapter on the mandala of Vajra-flame-sun-like-great-radiance from the commentary on the Supreme Original Buddha, called the Origin of Transcendental Wisdom.

original: // / de ltar khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa gsungs nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar khro bas khro ba spang ba'i phyir rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa gsungs nas /
translated: Having thus taught the chapter on the mandala of Vajra-flame-sun-like-great-radiance for the purpose of abandoning anger through anger,

original: da ni log par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: da ni log par lta ba'i gnyen por gyur pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rtog pa gsungs pa ni /
translated: now, for the purpose of abandoning wrong views, he teaches the chapter on the noble Avalokiteśvara.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: Thus, he says then and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te /
translated: The word then indicates the immediately following statement.

original: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: dang po sbyor ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: Immediately after the first yoga.

original: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa nyid yin no //
translated: Here, the preparatory concentration is just that taught in the mandala of glorious Vajrasattva.

original: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad do //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin thams cad do //
translated: All concentrations are the concentrations of all the Tathagatas.🔽It is the single-pointed thought of all the Tathagatas, of the noble Avalokitesvara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is what it means.🔽And this is what is said below:

original: de yang 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gang zhig la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de yang 'di nyid kyi 'og nas gang zhig la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum ma lus pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: By looking at whom, the Tathagata becomes the lord of the entire three realms.

original: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word “only” is for the purpose of exclusion.

original: gang las byung zhe na /
analyzed: gang las byung zhe na /
translated: From what does it arise?

original: rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las //
analyzed: rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las //
translated: From the supreme reality of purity.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is what is said.

original: thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la gzigs pa ni chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mchog go //
analyzed: thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa la gzigs pa ni chos thams cad kyi chos kyi mchog go //
translated: The vision of the complete purity of all things is the supreme state of all things.

original: rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi mchog de las 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi mchog de las 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: That which arises from that supreme state of purity is called “all meditative absorptions.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang zhig yin zhe na /
translated: ” What is a meditative absorption?

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni //
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni //
translated: The great lord Avalokiteśvara

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is said to be🔽the supreme essence,

original: rang gi snying po mchog snyoms zhugs //
analyzed: rang gi snying po mchog snyoms zhugs //
translated: the meditative absorption.🔽The great lord Avalokiteśvara

original: zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya ba sbyar ro //
translated: is said to be🔽the supreme essence,

original: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: the meditative absorption.

original: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di //
analyzed: ji ltar padma dmar po 'di //
translated: Just as this red lotus

original: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
analyzed: tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa //
translated: is not soiled by the faults of the mud,

original: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa ni //
analyzed: de bzhin khams gsum dag pa ni //
translated: so the purity of the three realms

original: gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos so //🔽zhes rtog pa mdzad pas na @325a * //🔽spyan ras gzigs so //
analyzed: gnas kyi nyes pas mi gos so // zhes rtog pa mdzad pas na @325a * // spyan ras gzigs so //
translated: is not soiled by the faults of the abode.🔽Thus, he is Avalokiteśvara.

original: de la mnga' brnyes pas na dbang phyug gi gtso bo'i gzugs thams cad ston par mdzad pas nam mkha'i khams la khyab par mdzad pas na chen po'o //
analyzed: de la mnga' brnyes pas na dbang phyug gi gtso bo'i gzugs thams cad ston par mdzad pas nam mkha'i khams la khyab par mdzad pas na chen po'o //
translated: Since he has attained mastery over that, he is the lord. Since he displays all forms, he is great. Since he pervades the realm of space, he is the great lord.

original: spyan ras gzigs dbang yang yin la /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang yang yin la /
translated: Avalokitesvara is also the lord.🔽

original: chen po yang yin pas spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po'o ;
analyzed: chen po yang yin pas spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po'o ;
translated: He is Avalokitesvara, and he is also great, hence the Great Avalokitesvara.

original: / ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba dang / rim pa tha dad pa'o //
analyzed: / ni'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba dang / rim pa tha dad pa'o //
translated: The word “also” means “exclusively” and “different stages.”

original: rdo rje sems dpa' gtso chen yin //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' gtso chen yin //
translated: Vajrasattva is the great chief.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gtso bo chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po yin no zhes pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gtso bo chen po 'jig rten dbang phyug chen po yin no zhes pa'o //
translated: This means that Vajrasattva himself is the great chief, the Great Lord of the World.

original: ci zhig mdzad nas khyab par ji lta bu zhig mkhyen nas rang gi snying po la snyoms par zhugs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig mdzad nas khyab par ji lta bu zhig mkhyen nas rang gi snying po la snyoms par zhugs she na /
translated: Having done what, and knowing what, did he enter into contemplation on his essence?

original: gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: gdug pa thams cad gdul ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to subdue all the wicked.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: And so on.

original: gdug pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na gdug pa thams cad de drag po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gdug pa yang yin la thams cad kyang yin pas na gdug pa thams cad de drag po la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are wicked and they are all, hence “all the wicked,” such as Rudra.

original: de rnams gdul ba ni tshar gcad pa dang / phan gdags pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams gdul ba ni tshar gcad pa dang / phan gdags pa'o //
translated: To subdue them is to destroy them and to benefit them.

original: don de'i phyir /
analyzed: don de'i phyir /
translated: For that purpose

original: rang gi rigs ni chen po bskyed //🔽ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: rang gi rigs ni chen po bskyed //🔽ces bya ba ste /
translated: he generated his own great clan.

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi rigs rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rang gi rigs rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'o //
translated: The Blessed One is Vajrasattva, his own clan, Vajra-flame.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor rang gi rdo rje las phyung ba ni bskyed pa yin la /
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor rang gi rdo rje las phyung ba ni bskyed pa yin la /
translated: His own mandala is produced from his own vajra, and is generated.

original: nam mkha' thams cad khyab pas na chen po'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' thams cad khyab pas na chen po'o //
translated: It is great because it pervades the whole sky.

original: ci'i phyir bskyed ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir bskyed ce na /
translated: Why is it generated?

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “all buddhas’ great wrath,” etc.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro bo chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo chen po ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi khro bo chen po ni sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo chen po ste /
translated: All buddhas’ great wrath is all buddhas’ great wrath.

original: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje me ltar rab tu 'bar ba'o //
translated: It is Vajra-flame.

original: de ni gang gi phyir gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs te rgyu yin no //
analyzed: de ni gang gi phyir gdug cing gtum pa'i sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i thabs te rgyu yin no //
translated: That is the means, the cause, for subduing all wicked, violent sentient beings.

original: 'di ci'i phyir rgyu yin zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ci'i phyir rgyu yin zhe na /
translated: Why is this the cause?

original: thams cad med pas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: thams cad med pas na zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “because of the absence of all,” etc.

original: sems can gdug cing gtum pa 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu gzhan med pas na /
analyzed: sems can gdug cing gtum pa 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyu gzhan med pas na /
translated: Because there is no other cause for the means of subduing wicked, violent sentient beings,

original: rang gi rigs chen bskyed pa yin //
analyzed: rang gi rigs chen bskyed pa yin //
translated: one should generate one’s own great clan.

original: rang gi snying po mchog snyoms zhugs //🔽zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rang gi snying po mchog snyoms zhugs // zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: He enters into the union of the supreme essence.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar zhugs she na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar zhugs she na /
translated: Why does he enter in that way?

original: ma dag pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
analyzed: ma dag pa'i zhes bya ba gsungs te ;
translated: He says, “because of the impurity of the world,”

original: gang gi phyir sems can gyi khams ma dag pa yin pas so //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems can gyi khams ma dag pa yin pas so //
translated: because the world of sentient beings is impure.

original: rgyu ci zhig gis she na /🔽'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas //
analyzed: rgyu ci zhig gis she na / 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas //
translated: By what cause?

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽'dod chags la sogs pa yang yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / 'dod chags la sogs pa yang yin la /
translated: “Because of the accumulation of desire and so on.”

original: kun kyang yin pas na 'dod chags la sogs pa kun te /
analyzed: kun kyang yin pas na 'dod chags la sogs pa kun te /
translated: Desire and so on are all the afflictions.

original: de rnams @325b bsags pa'i thog ma med pa'i dus nas byung bas na shas cher bsags pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams @325b bsags pa'i thog ma med pa'i dus nas byung bas na shas cher bsags pa'o //
translated: The accumulation of those has been occurring since beginningless time, so it is a great accumulation.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa bsags pa des na /
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa bsags pa des na /
translated: Because of the accumulation of desire and so on,

original: gang gi phyir sems can gyi khams ni ma dag par gyur pa de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sems can gyi khams ni ma dag par gyur pa de'i phyir snyoms par zhugs par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: the world of sentient beings has become impure. Therefore, he enters into union.

original: de rnams la yang rang zhen par //
analyzed: de rnams la yang rang zhen par //
translated: “He is also attached to them.”

original: zhes bya pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa de rnams la rab tu zhen par byed cing //
analyzed: zhes bya pa ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa de rnams la rab tu zhen par byed cing //
translated: Those who are attached to desire, hatred, etc.🔽are attached to women, killing, etc. in the manner of not turning away from them at all.

original: bud med bsnyen pa dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i tshul du zhen cing shin tu mi ldog pas rjes su 'brel par skyes bu'i dam pa ste /
analyzed: bud med bsnyen pa dang / srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i tshul du zhen cing shin tu mi ldog pas rjes su 'brel par skyes bu'i dam pa ste /
translated: The best of men is one who is born with a connection to them.

original: skyes bu'i mchog gi mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu'i mchog gi mkhyen cing thugs su chud pa yin no //
translated: The best of men knows and understands them.

original: ji ltar na de rnams rab tu zhen pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar na de rnams rab tu zhen pa yin zhe na /
translated: How are they attached?

original: gang gi phyir mi 'dul bas na sangs rgyas kyang mchog tu mnga' na mi mdzad de zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi 'dul bas na sangs rgyas kyang mchog tu mnga' na mi mdzad de zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Because they are not disciplined, even the Buddha, who is the best, does not act.🔽Even the Buddha does not act

original: de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir //🔽sangs rgyas kyang mnga' mi mdzad cing //
analyzed: de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir // sangs rgyas kyang mnga' mi mdzad cing //
translated: for the sake of disciplining them.

original: bdag por ma gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag por ma gyur pa yin no //
translated: He is not their master.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: mi 'dul bas na zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: mi 'dul bas na zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because they are not disciplined.

original: zhi ba'i tshul gyis mi 'dul bas rgyu de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhi ba'i tshul gyis mi 'dul bas rgyu de'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are not disciplined by the method of pacification, for that reason.

original: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu'o //
analyzed: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni shin tu'o //
translated: The word “best” means “supreme.”

original: de ltar sangs rgyas kyang 'dul ba ma mnga' mi mdzad pas na 'jig rten rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de ltar sangs rgyas kyang 'dul ba ma mnga' mi mdzad pas na 'jig rten rnams la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Thus, since the Buddha does not have a discipline that is not practiced, he says, “for the sake of the world,” and so on.

original: rmongs pas shin tu zil gyis mnan par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rmongs pas shin tu zil gyis mnan par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: For the sake of benefiting sentient beings who are completely overwhelmed by delusion,

original: 'jig rten gyi mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs pa la gnas par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' snyoms par zhugs pa la gnas par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: the Blessed One, the supreme one of the world, Vajrasattva, abides in meditative equipoise.

original: ci zhig la snyoms par zhugs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig la snyoms par zhugs she na /
translated: In what does he abide?

original: rang gi snying po mchog la zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang gi snying po mchog la zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He says, “in his own supreme essence.”

original: rang gi bdag nyid kyi snying po bzang po mchog ste de la'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid kyi snying po bzang po mchog ste de la'o //
translated: In his own excellent essence, his supreme self, that is where.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs sgeg pa dang / zhi ba dang khro bo'i nyams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba la rab tu bzhag nas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshul dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje'i rigs sgeg pa dang / zhi ba dang khro bo'i nyams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba la rab tu bzhag nas /
translated: Having placed the realm of sentient beings to be disciplined in the way of Vajrasattva, the Tathāgata, and the family of Vajra, with the moods of flirtatiousness, peace, and wrath,

original: snying rje'i nyams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: snying rje'i nyams kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The Bhagavān, the Great Vajradhara, is the one who is in samādhi, in order to tame those sentient beings who are to be tamed by the experience of compassion.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no //🔽de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa yin te /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa yin no // de la 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di nyid rnam par 'grel pa yin te /
translated: He is the Bhagavān, the Great Vajradhara, who is in samādhi, in order to tame those sentient beings who are to be tamed by the experience of compassion.🔽Here, this and so on is the commentary.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba 'og nas bshad pa thugs la bzhag nas 'di skad gsungs pa yin @326a * //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba 'og nas bshad pa thugs la bzhag nas 'di skad gsungs pa yin @326a * //
translated: Having placed this and so on in his mind, he spoke thus.

original: no ; / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi tshul gyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par so sor rtogs pa'o //
analyzed: no ; / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gi tshul gyis chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag par so sor rtogs pa'o //
translated: The samādhi of all tathāgatas is the realization of all phenomena as naturally pure through the method of Lokeśvara.

original: des kyang ting nge 'dzin gzhan zil gyis mnan nas mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: des kyang ting nge 'dzin gzhan zil gyis mnan nas mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //
translated: Since that also outshines other samādhis, it is beautiful and blazing, thus it is the king.

original: 'di nyid ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: This is the samadhi called “the seal of the blessing of the vajra of the wisdom of the reality of the natural purity of all phenomena.”

original: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang / padma'i rigs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin can gyi sems dang sems las byung ba rnams dang / padma'i rigs so //
translated: All phenomena are naturally pure, having the nature of the perfection of wisdom, of the mind and mental factors, and of the lotus family.

original: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: de rnams kyi chos nyid ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: Their reality is thusness.

original: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
analyzed: de'i ye shes ni nges pa'o //
translated: Its wisdom is ascertainment.

original: de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis bskyed cing gzhig par mi nus pas na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyis bskyed cing gzhig par mi nus pas na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i phyir rdo rje'o //
translated: It is a vajra because it is like a vajra, since it cannot be generated or destroyed by any conceptualization.

original: gang gis de byin gyis brlab cing 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: gang gis de byin gyis brlab cing 'jig rten dbang phyug gi skur byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la ming de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi by which one is blessed with that and becomes the body of Lokeśvara is called by that name.

original: gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin gang zhig la rnam par gzigs shing mngon sum du mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa khams gsum pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ting nge 'dzin gang zhig la rnam par gzigs shing mngon sum du mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa khams gsum pa ma lus pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Because, by observing and manifesting any samadhi, all tathagatas, Vairochana and so forth, of the entire three realms, are completely included in that samadhi.🔽

original: srid pa gsum mtha' dag thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: srid pa gsum mtha' dag thams cad kyi bdag po zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because, by looking at and manifesting any samādhi, all the Tathāgatas, i.e., Vairocana and so forth, are the lords of the entire three realms, i.e., of the entire three worlds.

original: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs su chud pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs su chud pa ni mngon sum du mdzad pa ste /
translated: The understanding of Ārya Avalokiteśvara is manifested,

original: sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku tshad med par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i phyir 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku tshad med par mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: and for the sake of training all sentient beings, Ārya Avalokiteśvara’s body is made immeasurable.

original: da ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i man ngag bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsnyems pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: da ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa'i man ngag bstan par bya ba'i phyir bsnyems pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Now, in order to teach the esoteric instructions for cultivating samādhi, [the Bhagavān] declares the pride, etc.

original: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma'i bzung ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje padma'i bzung ste /
translated: Holding the vajra lotus with the left lotus fist,

original: des bsnyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas phyag g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang / mdzub mos rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs de'i 'dab ma la kha 'byed par mdzad pas rtog cing gzigs par mdzad pa yin no //
analyzed: des bsnyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas phyag g-yas pa'i mthe bong dang / mdzub mos rang gi thugs ka'i phyogs de'i 'dab ma la kha 'byed par mdzad pas rtog cing gzigs par mdzad pa yin no //
translated: He does so with a gesture of pride, opening the petals of the lotus at his heart with the thumb and forefinger of his right hand, and looking at them with a gaze of reflection.

original: ci zhig gis gzigs she na /
analyzed: ci zhig gis gzigs she na /
translated: What does he look at?

original: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: He looks at the nature, he says.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid ni rang bzhin te chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The nature of things is their suchness, the reality of all phenomena.

original: rang bzhin des gzigs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bsgom par @326b mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rang bzhin des gzigs pa ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'o zhes bsgom par @326b mdzad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: He looks at that nature, he meditates on the fact that all phenomena are pure by nature.

original: ji ltar gzigs par mdzad ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzigs par mdzad ce na /
translated: How does he look at it?

original: ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: He says, with whatever concentration he is able.

original: rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun par bsgom pa ni ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
analyzed: rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun par bsgom pa ni ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin te /
translated: Meditation in accordance with one’s ability is concentration to the best of one’s ability.

original: ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin des padma'i 'dab ma rnam par dbye bar mdzad cing gzigs pa yin no //
analyzed: ci nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin des padma'i 'dab ma rnam par dbye bar mdzad cing gzigs pa yin no //
translated: He looks upon the lotus petals with that samādhi as much as possible.

original: de ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzigs pa'i tshul rnam par 'brel pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni ji ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzigs pa'i tshul rnam par 'brel pa yin te /
translated: That is the connection with the way of looking, as in “just as,” and so on.

original: ji ltar sgrub pa po'i lag na gnas pa'i padma dmar po 'di kha dog dmar po dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: ji ltar sgrub pa po'i lag na gnas pa'i padma dmar po 'di kha dog dmar po dang rjes su mthun pa nyid kyis so //
translated: Just as this red lotus in the hand of the practitioner is red in color, it is similar to the color.

original: tshon gyi nyes pa ni tshon gyi skyon te rdzas gzhan dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar ma gyur pa'o //
analyzed: tshon gyi nyes pa ni tshon gyi skyon te rdzas gzhan dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar ma gyur pa'o //

original: des ma gos pa ni ma 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: des ma gos pa ni ma 'dres pa ste /

original: padma dmar du zin kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas mthe'u chung las byung ba'i chu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ji ltar padma de la gos par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du khams gsum dag pa thugs rje chen
analyzed: padma dmar du zin kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pas mthe'u chung las byung ba'i chu dang 'dab ma la sogs pa'i nyes pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis ji ltar padma de la gos par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du khams gsum dag pa thugs rje chen
translated: Even though the lotus is red, it has the quality of being unmixed, and therefore, just as the lotus is not tainted by the various faults of the water, petals, and so on, arising from the little finger, in the same way, the great compassion of the three realms of purity

original: po dang ldan pa'i chos bdag med pa'i chags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba yin no //
analyzed: po dang ldan pa'i chos bdag med pa'i chags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral ba yin no //
translated: The bodhisattva who is endowed with the Dharma of the emptiness of self, who is free from the stains of the afflictions and secondary afflictions such as desire,

original: rgyu gang gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'i rgyu des rgyal po ste /
analyzed: rgyu gang gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs shing mngon sum du mdzad pa'i rgyu des rgyal po ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa ste /

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug nyid du gyur pa yin no //

original: de yis zhes bya ba ni rgyu des so //
analyzed: de yis zhes bya ba ni rgyu des so //
translated: By that cause,

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Vajrasattva is Great Vajradhara.

original: spyan ras gzigs ni tshul des so sor rtog cing gzigs par mdzad pas dbang phyug ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa ste /
analyzed: spyan ras gzigs ni tshul des so sor rtog cing gzigs par mdzad pas dbang phyug ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa ste /
translated: Avalokita, by that method, is the lord who discerns and sees, the chief one.

original: de lta bur gyur cing nye bar skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bur gyur cing nye bar skyed pa'o //
translated: He is generated in that way.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Having bound the great seal of Avalokita,

analyzed: ya th'a rakta mi dam padma da ma ga to shi rna la li bya te /

original: ba sa do she shva b'i b'i ta dhe t'a dhuddha tri dh'a tu kam zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos shing snying po 'di bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ba sa do she shva b'i b'i ta dhe t'a dhuddha tri dh'a tu kam zhes bya ba'i snying po zlos shing snying po 'di bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i phyir /

translated: just as the Bhagavat becomes Avalokiteśvara, in the same way, by the power of meditating on this essence mantra and looking, Vajrasattva becomes the noble Avalokiteśvara.

analyzed: yin no // de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /

original: bshad ma thag pa'i sgom pa'i snying po'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i sgom pa'i snying po'o //
translated: The essence mantra is the one just explained.

original: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ston par byed pa'i snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos sgom par dag pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ston par byed pa'i snying po 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos sgom par dag pa zhes bya ste /

analyzed: de kho na nyid kyis sgom pas bsgoms shing yang dang yang du mngon sum du mdzad par gyur pa yin no //

analyzed: de'i tshe rgyal po rdo rje 'chang chen po padma chen po 'chang bar gyur cing /

original: de ltar snang ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar snang ba yin no //

analyzed: gser sbyangs pa ni rin po che gzhan dang ma 'dres pa dang / dri ma dang bral ba'o //

original: ri'i dbang po ni ri rab bo //
analyzed: ri'i dbang po ni ri rab bo //

original: gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ni //
analyzed: gser sbyangs ri yi dbang po ni //

analyzed: zhes bya'o // rgyal po che zhes bya ba ni de dang bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzi mdangs dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: is called the great king. The one who is equal and similar to the Blessed One and noble Avalokiteśvara in splendor is called that.

original: g-yon na bsnyems bcas padma mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa la g-yon na zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur bsnyems pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pas na /
analyzed: g-yon na bsnyems bcas padma mchog / ces bya ba la sogs pa la g-yon na zhes bya ba ni g-yon pa'i padma'i khu tshur bsnyems pa dang bcas pas 'dzin pas na /
translated: In the left, the supreme lotus with arrogance and so forth. In the left means that he holds the left lotus fist with arrogance.

original: g-yon pa bsnyems bcas padma zhes bya ba la mchog ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: g-yon pa bsnyems bcas padma zhes bya ba la mchog ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /

analyzed: g-yon na bsnyems pa dang bcas pa'i padma yang yin la mchog kyang yin pas zhes mtshams sbyar ro //
translated: The left is arrogant, and it is a lotus, and it is supreme, thus the compound.

original: phyag g-yas pas thugs ka'i phyogs su padma'i 'dab ma 'byed par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: phyag g-yas pas thugs ka'i phyogs su padma'i 'dab ma 'byed par mdzad pa'o //

original: mchog tu gzigs pas nye bar mtshon pas na /
analyzed: mchog tu gzigs pas nye bar mtshon pas na /

original: mchog gis rnam par gzigs zhes bya ste /

original: de lta bu'i tshul gyis gzigs pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i tshul gyis gzigs pa'o //
translated: He sees in that way.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Then, and so forth.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug padma'i 'dab ma la gzigs pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag na gnas pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams la padma chen po 'dzin pa rnams phyung ngo //

translated: In this way, the Blessed One, the Noble Avalokiteśvara, having dwelt in the manner of gazing at the lotus petals, immediately after that, from the lotus petals residing in the Blessed One's hand, great lotuses were emitted, holding great lotuses.

original: de su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de su zhig yin zhe na /
translated: Who is that?

original: sangs rgyas la sogs te ji ltar 'og nas bshad pa rnams byung nas sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mchog dam pa dag mdzad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas la sogs te ji ltar 'og nas bshad pa rnams byung nas sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mchog dam pa dag mdzad par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas phyogs bcur sems can rnams skal ba ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas nyid btsal ba @327b la sogs pa ma lus par yang dag par sbyangs nas dpal rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbyibs kyis rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gi dkyil 'khor
translated: Then, in the ten directions, having completely purified sentient beings according to their fortune, seeking Buddhahood and so forth, in the shape of the great maṇḍala of glorious Vajrasattva, the maṇḍala of Vajra Lokeśvara

original: der bzhugs shing gnas par mdzad do //
analyzed: der bzhugs shing gnas par mdzad do //
translated: dwelt and abided there.

original: gang la padma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad po yod pa 'di ni pad bzangs te /
analyzed: gang la padma bzang po 'dab ma brgyad po yod pa 'di ni pad bzangs te /
translated: This is the excellent lotus, which has eight petals.

original: padma bzang po'i dkyil 'khor der /
analyzed: padma bzang po'i dkyil 'khor der /
translated: In the mandala of the excellent lotus,

analyzed: phyogs bcu nas byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams padma der zhugs pa yin no //
translated: the Buddhas who have come from the ten directions enter that lotus.🔽Thus, from the verse beginning

original: de ltar de nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni /
analyzed: de ltar de nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad ni /
translated: All samadhis

original: rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las //
analyzed: rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las //
translated: arise from the supreme reality of purity,

analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /

analyzed: padma bzang po de la bzhugs //

analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ni gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: de nas yang ji skad du bshad pa'i tshul gyis sems can gyi khams rnams skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
translated: Then, in the manner that has been explained, the realms of sentient beings, according to their fortune,

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston pa'i tshig yin te /

analyzed: sems can thams cad lung dang rtogs pa la rab tu 'jog par mdzad pas na thams cad 'dul mdzad do //
translated: He is the controller of all, because he establishes all sentient beings in the scriptures and realizations.

analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug go //

original: shin tu dag pa'i chos 'dzin pa //
analyzed: shin tu dag pa'i chos 'dzin pa //

translated: The Lotus family is free from afflictions along with their traces, and the perfection of wisdom is the very pure Dharma.

analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dzin par mdzad pas na shin tu dag pa'i chos 'dzin pa'o //
translated: He is the holder of the very pure Dharma, because he holds it in the manner of being its very nature.

original: de su zhig yin zhe na /
analyzed: de su zhig yin zhe na /

analyzed: rdo rje chos te 'jig rten dbang @328a * //

original: phyug go // rang nyid ni bdag nyid do //
analyzed: phyug go // rang nyid ni bdag nyid do //

analyzed: gzugs thams cad kun du ston pas phyogs bcur mdzes shing 'bar bas na rgyal po'o //

analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug bka' stsal to //

analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug gis nye bar mtshon pa'i dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ste /

analyzed: de bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal pos bka' stsal zhing zhes gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi'o /

analyzed: // dbus zhes bya ba ni lte ba'i phyogs su'o //

original: spyan 'dzum pa zhes bya 'dzum bag can no //
analyzed: spyan 'dzum pa zhes bya 'dzum bag can no //
translated: The smiling eye is the smiling eye.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug ces bya ba 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sna tshogs padma'i gdan la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa dgod par bya'o //

original: sku mdog ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: sku mdog ji lta bu zhe na /

original: dag pa'i gser gyi padma ni //
analyzed: dag pa'i gser gyi padma ni //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
