analyzed: dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of the great maṇḍala,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya zhes shugs kyi spyang par bya ste dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la sgo dbye ba byas nas bsdu bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i tshul gyi cho ga rgyas pa ji bzhin bya zhes shugs kyi spyang par bya ste dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du bris la sgo dbye ba byas nas bsdu bar bya'o //
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala just as it is, having opened the door, one should gather.

original: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas la /
translated: Then, having praised with the one hundred and eight names,

original: spyan drang pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs nas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas sdom pa blangs te /
analyzed: spyan drang pa'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs nas mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod la phyag byas nas sdom pa blangs te /
translated: having invited with the gesture of invitation, having made offerings with all offerings, having made obeisance, having taken the vows,

original: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya ba 'di ni 'dir cho ga rgyas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas bdag nyid dbang bskur bar bya ba 'di ni 'dir cho ga rgyas pa yin no //
translated: having bound the gesture of entry, one should confer empowerment on oneself. This is the extensive rite here.

original: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis zhugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis mnyam por gzhi bas te mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo la mdzub mo gnyis kyi gdong gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur te de lta bu'i nor bu'i khu🔽tshur gyis zhugs pa'o//
analyzed: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis zhugs zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bsdams pa bcings la mthe bong gnyis mnyam por gzhi bas te mthe bong gnyis kyi rtse mo la mdzub mo gnyis kyi gdong gzhag pa 'di ni nor bu'i khu tshur te de lta bu'i nor bu'i khu tshur gyis zhugs pa'o//
translated: This is the “fist of the jewel.”

original: @343a * // nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: @343a * // nam mkha' las byung zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: “Arisen from space” means that the essence of space is space.

original: de las byung ba'i dam tshig ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i dam tshig ni nam mkha' las byung ba'o //
translated: The commitment arisen from that is “arisen from space.”

original: nam mkha' las byung ba'i dam tshig de mchog yin pas na dam pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung ba'i dam tshig de mchog yin pas na dam pa'o //
translated: That commitment arisen from space is supreme, and so is “the best.”

original: zhugs nas dam tshig brjod par bya //
analyzed: zhugs nas dam tshig brjod par bya //
translated: “Having entered, one should recite the commitment.”

original: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Having entered the maṇḍala, one should pay homage to the Bhagavān and recite this:

original: khyod ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
analyzed: khyod ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
translated: “You are arisen from space,

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen nam mkha' ste de las khyod byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje rin chen nam mkha' ste de las khyod byung ba yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This is the meaning: You have come forth from the sky of the Vajra Jewel, that is, from the sky of the Vajra Jewel.

original: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin //
translated: The fifth of all.

original: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang padma'i rigs ni thams cad de de'i lnga pa zhes bya ba lnga pa'i grangs bkod par byed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang padma'i rigs ni thams cad de de'i lnga pa zhes bya ba lnga pa'i grangs bkod par byed pa'o //
translated: This is the meaning: The fifth of all means that the fifth number is assigned to the Vajra- sattva, Tathagata, Vajra, and Lotus families, which are all.

original: aom siddhi h'um bhu zhes bya ba ni sa'i 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub kyi bar ro //
analyzed: aom siddhi h'um bhu zhes bya ba ni sa'i 'jig rten gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos grub kyi bar ro //
translated: Om siddhi hum bhuh means up to the accomplishment of the nature of the earth world.

original: bhu ba zhes bya ba ni bar snang gi dngos grub kyi bar du'o //
analyzed: bhu ba zhes bya ba ni bar snang gi dngos grub kyi bar du'o //
translated: Bhuh means up to the accomplishment of the nature of the sky.

original: sa zhes bya ba ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi ngo bo nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar ro //
analyzed: sa zhes bya ba ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi ngo bo nyid kyi dngos grub kyi bar ro //
translated: Svaha means up to the accomplishment of the nature of the heavenly world.

original: badzra ratna zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po 'di dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i 'byor ba dang ldan pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas so //
analyzed: badzra ratna zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po 'di dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i 'byor ba dang ldan pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas so //
translated: Vajra ratna means that by the accomplishment of the nature of the goddess who possesses the wealth of the consecration jewel of this noble Akasagarbha, one attains the consecration of the jewel.

original: b'a b'a zhes bya ba ni gter gyi rin chen dpal gyi lha mo grub pas so //
analyzed: b'a b'a zhes bya ba ni gter gyi rin chen dpal gyi lha mo grub pas so //
translated: Bhava bhava means By the accomplishment of the treasure-jewel-glory-goddess.

original: da da zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po nor bu chen po'i phun sum tshogs pa'i lha mo grub bo //
analyzed: da da zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po nor bu chen po'i phun sum tshogs pa'i lha mo grub bo //
translated: Dadad means By the accomplishment of the great jewel-wealth-knowledge-king goddess.

original: tam zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas kyang grub par mdzod ces gsol ba 'debs so //
analyzed: tam zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i rgyal po bla na med pa zhes bya ba'i mchod pa'i lha mo'i rang bzhin grub pas kyang grub par mdzod ces gsol ba 'debs so //
translated: Tam means By the accomplishment of the nature of the knowledge-king-goddess called 'Unsurpassed'.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad na thag pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad na thag pa'i dam tshig gi sngags so //
translated: This means If explained, the mantra of the rope pledge.

original: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa ste /
analyzed: bzlas pa tsam gyis zhes bya ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa ste /
translated: By mere recitation means By prior repetition,

original: mtshan thog thag bzlas pa ma yin pas so //
analyzed: mtshan thog thag bzlas pa ma yin pas so //
translated: not by reciting all night.

original: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dngos grub thams cad de dngos grub de thams cad la'o //
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i dngos grub rnams ni dngos grub thams cad de dngos grub de thams cad la'o //
translated: Space heart means By all the accomplishments of Space Heart and so forth, by all those accomplishments.

original: phun sum tshogs pa kun la'ang shin tu ni //
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa kun la'ang shin tu ni //
translated: And also for all perfections, very much,

original: zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa kun te de rnams la shin tu zhes bya ba /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rig pa'i lha mo rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa rnams ni phun sum tshogs pa kun te de rnams la shin tu zhes bya ba /
translated: This is the accomplishment of the Goddess of Knowledge, the various mundane perfections, all perfections, very means.

original: mnyam par grub 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med //🔽@343b ces bya ba /
analyzed: mnyam par grub 'gyur 'di ni the tshom med // @343b ces bya ba /
translated: Accomplishment is certain.

original: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po grub par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po grub par gyur pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the Blessed One Akashagarbha.

original: de nas nor bu'i khu tshur chen po g-yas pa'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu ba bya ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i khu tshur chen po g-yas pa'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor bris nas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu ba bya ba dang / mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: Then, having drawn the mandala of the great jewel fist, one should summon with the right iron hook, open the door, and perform the gathering, immediately after the one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar dgug par byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das byon nas don zhes bya ba nor bu'i rigs chen po'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i snying po grub par gyur pa ni nor bu'i rigs chen po grub par gyur🔽pa'i tshul gyis 'grub par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa de ltar dgug par byas pa'i rjes thogs nyid la bcom ldan 'das byon nas don zhes bya ba nor bu'i rigs chen po'i rang bzhin nam mkha'i snying po grub par gyur pa ni nor bu'i rigs chen po grub par gyur pa'i tshul gyis 'grub par gyur pa'o //
translated: Then, etc.🔽Thus, immediately after the summoning, the Blessed One arrived, and the meaning, the nature of the great jewel family, Akashagarbha, was accomplished, that is, was accomplished in the manner of the accomplishment of the great jewel family.

original: de kho na nyid mchog gi snying pos lan cig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid mchog gi snying pos lan cig ces bya ba ni /
translated: By the essence of supreme reality, once, etc.

original: khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
analyzed: khyed ni nam mkha' las byung ba //
translated: You are born from space,

original: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin //🔽zhes bya ba nas /
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni lnga pa yin // zhes bya ba nas /
translated: the fifth of all.

original: bha ba da ha tram zhes bya ba'i bar ni de kho na nyid kyi mchog gi snying po ste /
analyzed: bha ba da ha tram zhes bya ba'i bar ni de kho na nyid kyi mchog gi snying po ste /
translated: Up to bhavadhatram, this is the essence of supreme reality.

original: de slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa na lan cig zlos su gzhug go //
analyzed: de slob dpon gyis slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa na lan cig zlos su gzhug go //
translated: The master should have the disciple who has entered the mandala repeat this once.🔽Then, the supreme wealth, etc.

original: de nas 'byor pa'i mchog ces bya ba ni lha mo'i 'byor ba'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de nas 'byor pa'i mchog ces bya ba ni lha mo'i 'byor ba'i rang bzhin no //
translated: is the nature of the wealth of the goddess.

original: rtag par brtan pa'i dpal ni lha mo dpal mo'i rang bzhin no //🔽phun sum tshogs pa ni lha mo shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rtag par brtan pa'i dpal ni lha mo dpal mo'i rang bzhin no // phun sum tshogs pa ni lha mo shin tu phun sum tshogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of Sri Devi is the glory of permanence and stability.🔽The nature of Sri-sampad Devi is the perfection of excellence.

original: mchod pa chen po ni lha mo mchod pa'i rang bzhin no ;
analyzed: mchod pa chen po ni lha mo mchod pa'i rang bzhin no ;
translated: The nature of Sri-arcita Devi is the worship of the Goddess.

original: / dngos grub rnams ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: / dngos grub rnams ni nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The nature of Akasagarbha and the others is the attainment of the powers.

original: mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: The supreme is the best.

original: thob ces bya ba ni slob ma rnams kyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: thob ces bya ba ni slob ma rnams kyis 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The attainment is that which is obtained by the disciples.

original: bde bar gshegs pa shin tu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa de bzhin du slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dam tshig gi sngags bzlas na 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: bde bar gshegs pa shin tu zhes bya ba ni ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nor bu'i rigs chen po'i dngos grub brnyes pa de bzhin du slob ma dkyil 'khor du bcug nas dam tshig gi sngags bzlas na 'thob pa'o //
translated: The disciples, having been admitted into the mandala, will attain the powers just as all the Tathagatas have attained the powers of the great jewel family, if they recite the pledge mantra.

original: yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste gnas dang bdag bsrung ba byas na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra ba mdun du bskyed la /
analyzed: yang 'di'i don brjod par bya ste gnas dang bdag bsrung ba byas na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum dang 'dra ba mdun du bskyed la /
translated: Also, the meaning of this should be stated: If one has performed the protection of the site and oneself, one should generate in front of oneself the maṇḍala of Ākāśagarbha, like a direct perception, with the mudrā of the vajra wheel.

original: gal te 'byor na me tog la sogs pa dngos su mchod nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa gzung bar bya'o //🔽de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo la sogs pa nas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur @344a * //
analyzed: gal te 'byor na me tog la sogs pa dngos su mchod nas dkyil 'khor lnga pas phyag byas la phyag bzhi la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa gzung bar bya'o // de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thal mo la sogs pa nas dam tshig gi rdo rje khu tshur @344a * //
translated: If one has the means, one should make offerings with flowers, and so on, in actuality, and having made obeisance with the five-point prostration, one should take up the vows with the four prostrations, and so on, beforehand.

original: bcings pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bya'o //
analyzed: bcings pa'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcing ba thams cad bya'o //
translated: Then, one should perform all the binding of the mudrās, from the vajra-folded-hands up to the binding of the vajra-fist pledge.

original: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i bar gyi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: de nas sdig pa dral ba'i bar gyi cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: Then, one should perform all the rites up to the extraction of the sin.

original: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bris nas de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la bzlas par bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bris nas de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should write the mantra to be repeated mentally on a vajra gem located on the moon at one’s heart, and while repeating that [mantra] one should meditate on the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: de nas rang gi lha'i snying po de dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa las rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i snying po de dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa las rang gi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, from that essence of one’s deity together with the sixteen vowels, one should imagine one’s mind as a moon disk.

original: de'i steng du yang rang gi snying po ka la sogs pa nas kasha'i bar gyi gsal ba'i yi ge dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: de'i steng du yang rang gi snying po ka la sogs pa nas kasha'i bar gyi gsal ba'i yi ge dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'o //
translated: On top of that, again, one’s essence together with the clear consonants from ka to kṣa is a second moon disk.

original: yang de rang gi snying po dang bcas pa la dang po'i rdo rje de nyid rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yang de rang gi snying po dang bcas pa la dang po'i rdo rje de nyid rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i gzugs su bsam par bya'o //
translated: Again, that [moon disk] together with one’s essence is the very first vajra, which one should imagine in the form of the seal-mark of one’s deity.

original: rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i nang du rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'i nang du rang gi phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the pride of one’s seal within the seal-mark of one’s deity.

original: de nas sems dpar byin gyis rlob ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la yang rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing rdo rje sems dpar rang gi lha'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sems dpar byin gyis rlob ba'i sbyor bas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la yang rang gi lha'i snying po zlos shing rdo rje sems dpar rang gi lha'i skur bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, by the yoga of blessing the mind, one should visualize oneself as Vajrasattva, the seal of one's deity, and also repeat the essence-mantra of one's deity, meditating on the body of one's deity as Vajrasattva.

original: de nas sa ma ya ho ham zhes brjod do //
analyzed: de nas sa ma ya ho ham zhes brjod do //
translated: Then one should say, samaya hoḥ haṃ.

original: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes brjod do//
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya ham zhes brjod do//
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of one's deity, one should say, samaya haṃ.

original: yang sa ma yas tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod cing snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: yang sa ma yas tva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod cing snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Again, saying, samaya stva adhi tiṣṭha sva maṃ, one should bless the heart, throat, forehead, and crown of one's head.

original: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rang gi lha'i snying po aa'i mtha' can brjod nas mdun du sna tshogs padma la rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bsams la snying po de zlos shing phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la rang gi lha'i snying po aa'i mtha' can brjod nas mdun du sna tshogs padma la rang gi lha'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bsams la snying po de zlos shing phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of one’s deity, and having uttered the essence mantra of one’s deity ending in aṃ, one should imagine the action seal of one’s deity on a multicolored lotus in front of oneself, and while repeating that essence mantra one should cultivate the pride of the seal.

original: de nas rang gi snying po brjod de /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying po brjod de /
translated: Then, having uttered one’s essence mantra,

original: phyag rgya de rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de rang gi lha'i skur bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on oneself as the form of one’s deity.

original: de nas der rin chen lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang rang gi snying po brjod cing dri shya zhes kyang brjod la blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas der rin chen lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis rang gi lha dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du byas la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang rang gi snying po brjod cing dri shya zhes kyang brjod la blta bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled one’s deity with the action seals such as Ratnapāśa, one should look at one’s deity with one’s pledge seal, uttering one’s essence mantra and also saying “Be visible!”

original: de nas dril bu dang spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs la rang gi lha rang gi sngags kyis rang gi lus la bcug la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de nas dril bu dang spyan drang ba'i phyag rgyas spyan drangs la rang gi lha rang gi sngags kyis rang gi lus la bcug la rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Form one's pledge seal, and🔽saying samaya stvam, generate the mandala of light.

original: sa ma ya stvam @344b zhes brjod cing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam aa hi dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba dang rang gi lha'i snying po'i mthar lan gsum brjod la rang gi lhar bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam @344b zhes brjod cing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam aa hi dza:h'um bam ho:zhes bya ba dang rang gi lha'i snying po'i mthar lan gsum brjod la rang gi lhar bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: Saying samaya stvam a-hi jhaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ three times at the end of one's deity's essence mantra, one should accomplish one's deity.🔽Then, seal with the Dharma, action, and great seal, and mentally enter into the moon at one's heart.

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la rang gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis zhugs la rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la 'jug pa'i cho gas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te zhugs nas rang
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la rang gi snying ga'i zla bar yid kyis zhugs la rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la 'jug pa'i cho gas me tog gi phreng ba blangs te zhugs nas rang
translated: With the vajra wheel gesture, generate the jewel family mandala, and with the rite of entry, take up the flower garland.

original: gi mgo bor me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: gi mgo bor me tog gi phreng ba dor bar bya'o //
translated: Having entered, one should cast the flower garland upon one's own head.

original: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs pa'i bar gyi cho ga rnams byas la /
analyzed: de nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blangs pa'i bar gyi cho ga rnams byas la /
translated: Then, having performed the rites up to the taking of the spiritual powers and the observances of the vajra,

original: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i nor bu'i rigs chen po'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i nor bu'i rigs chen po'i rnal 'byor chen po bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should accomplish the great yoga of the great jewel family, as taught in the Ārya Tattva-saṃgraha.

original: de nas dang po'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung ba'i bar gyi rang gi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum
analyzed: de nas dang po'i rdo rje snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas yi ge brgya pas brtan par byas la de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung ba'i bar gyi rang gi cho ga rnams rjes su spyad de snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum
translated: Then, having consecrated the first vajra as before, one should stabilize it with the hundred-syllable [mantra], and having performed the rites up to the taking of reality, the Dharma, and the commitments, one should recite the three essences as before.

original: brjod nas don gsum rnam par bsgom ste /
analyzed: brjod nas don gsum rnam par bsgom ste /
translated: Having contemplated the three objects,

original: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la bzlas par bya ba'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la bzlas par bya ba'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
translated: one should mentally write the essence to be repeated on the vajra jewel located in one's heart.

original: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po bdag po mchog / rdo rje snying khyod bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la nyid re bya ba'i sbyor bas lha thams cad kyi bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po bdag po mchog / rdo rje snying khyod bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la nyid re bya ba'i sbyor bas lha thams cad kyi bzlas brjod 'bum 'bum bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should recite one hundred thousand times for each deity the mantra of all the deities.

original: de ltar na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro //🔽yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor sprul la lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos shing yid kyis bkod la snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum zlos shing don gsum bsgoms la bdag ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor
analyzed: de ltar na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro // yang na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya rang gi snying gar dkyil 'khor sprul la lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos shing yid kyis bkod la snga ma bzhin du snying po gsum zlos shing don gsum bsgoms la bdag ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor
translated: In this way, one will have performed the preliminary service.🔽 Alternatively, one should emanate the mandala at one's heart with the vajra wheel gesture, and mentally arrange all the deities' essence mantras, and as before, recite the three essences and contemplate the three meanings, and generate the pride, I am the nature of the mandala of noble Akashagarbha.

original: gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas lha thams cad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che der bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: gyi rang bzhin yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed nas lha thams cad kyi thugs ka'i zla ba la rdo rje rin po che der bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po yid kyis bris la /
translated: On the moon at the heart of all the deities, one should mentally draw the vajra jewel, and in that, the Blessed Noble Akashagarbha.

original: de nyid zlos shing don dam par lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du ji srid nyin re zhing dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom pa'i dus su mngon sum nyid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid zlos shing don dam par lha thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid du ji srid nyin re zhing dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du bdag nyid bsgom pa'i dus su mngon sum nyid du mthong bar gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting that, one should meditate on the nature of all the deities in the ultimate truth, as long as one sees oneself in the nature of the mandala every day.

original: de lta bus ni lhag par yang sngon ru bsnyen ba byas par 'gyur ro //🔽de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te yang zhag @345a * //
analyzed: de lta bus ni lhag par yang sngon ru bsnyen ba byas par 'gyur ro // de nas ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom pa nas brtsams te yang zhag @345a * //
translated: By that, one will be even more purified from previous obscurations.

original: bdun bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: bdun bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, beginning with the meditation on the three samadhis, one should meditate for seven days.

original: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re rer dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nyin re'am zla ba re rer dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should draw the mandala every day or every month.

original: de la dang por khyed re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas mngon par 'dong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
analyzed: de la dang por khyed re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas mngon par 'dong pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
translated: To that end, first of all, you should all gather all the necessary articles and sit in the center of the maṇḍala of the approach.

original: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar snyoms par 'jug las langs te /
analyzed: rdo rje me ltar 'bar bar snyoms par 'jug las langs te /
translated: Then, having entered the samadhi of Vajra Blazing Fire, arise and

original: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas la sogs pa byas la mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang mchod yon dang las thams cad pa'i chu snod la ba zlas brjod byas na rdo rje las nor bu rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la phyag tshal ba la
analyzed: bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas la sogs pa byas la mchod pa rnams pa lnga dang mchod yon dang las thams cad pa'i chu snod la ba zlas brjod byas na rdo rje las nor bu rin po che'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sprul la phyag tshal ba la
translated: Having performed the rites of dispelling obstructors and so forth, if one recites the mantra over the five offerings, the water for drinking and the water for ritual action, the vajra action emanates the maṇḍala of the jewel family and makes obeisance and so forth.

original: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa bzung ste ;
analyzed: sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas de bzhin du sdom pa bzung ste ;
translated: Having taken the vows as before,

original: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du rnal 'byor chen po byas la de nas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: one should perform the great yoga as before, then perform all the rites,

original: de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung nas ji lta ba bzhin du ri rab bskyed de /
analyzed: de kho na nyid dang chos dang dam tshig bzung nas ji lta ba bzhin du ri rab bskyed de /
translated: and having taken the vows of reality, dharma, and samaya, one should generate Meru as before.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste sngar bshad pa'i spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'dug ste sngar bshad pa'i spro ba bskyed pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rnams byas la /
translated: Having generated the maṇḍala of the vajra wheel on top of that, one should sit in the center of the maṇḍala and perform the rite of generating enthusiasm and so forth, as previously explained.

original: lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum po de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lus thams cad kyis phyag byas nas ting nge 'dzin gsum po de bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having bowed with one's whole body, one should meditate on those three meditative stabilizations.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i snying po zlos shing /🔽dbang phyug chen po dngos grub mchog ;🔽/ rtog pa thams cad bshad du gsol //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la de'i snying po zlos shing / dbang phyug chen po dngos grub mchog ; / rtog pa thams cad bshad du gsol //
translated: Then, having formed the great seal of the Lord of Mysteries, one should recite his essence mantra.

original: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol pa btab par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid la gsol pa btab par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that one requests of him, Please explain all the rites of the maṇḍala of all the tathāgatas, the supreme attainment of Maheśvara.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rang gi snying po zlos shing dkyil 'khor bteg la bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag nas de nyid dang rang gi snying pos snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang /
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rang gi snying po zlos shing dkyil 'khor bteg la bar snang gi phyogs su bzhag nas de nyid dang rang gi snying pos snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang /
translated: Then, as before, one should recite one's own essence mantra with one's own pledge seal, lift up the maṇḍala, place it in the sky, and, with that [seal] and one's own essence mantra, consecrate the heart, forehead, throat,🔽and crown of one's head.

original: spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas yang phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Having again formed the great seal, one should recite one's own essence mantra with the pledge seal.

original: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la /🔽aa zhes bya ba las rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la rkang mthil gnyis kyis mnan pa'i ri rab kyi steng nas brtsams te /🔽sa gzhi gtan pa la thug gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: badzra drishta ma ta zhes bya ba mig gnyis su bkod la / aa zhes bya ba las rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bsams la rkang mthil gnyis kyis mnan pa'i ri rab kyi steng nas brtsams te / sa gzhi gtan pa la thug gi bar du rdo rje'i rang bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: The two eyes are marked with vajra sight (vajra-dṛṣṭi).🔽 From the syllable a (at the navel), one should visualize a variegated vajra on both soles of the feet.

original: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin gnas //🔽kun du rnam par bltas nas ni //🔽snying po kun tu @345b zlos byed cing //🔽bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
analyzed: phyag rgya la gnas de bzhin gnas // kun du rnam par bltas nas ni // snying po kun tu @345b zlos byed cing // bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor //
translated: Having pressed down with both soles of the feet, beginning from the top of Mount Meru, the earth is transformed into the nature of vajra down to the bottom of the foundation.

original: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know the remaining [mantras] as before.

original: de nas nor bu mchod pa'i gzugs can rdo rje las lta bu'i sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rang gi snying ga nas yid kyis phyung la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nor bu mchod pa'i gzugs can rdo rje las lta bu'i sgrub pa'i grogs mchog rang gi snying ga nas yid kyis phyung la sngar bshad pa'i cho gas phyi'i dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should visualize the supreme friend of practice, who has the form of a jewel-worshipping deity, as emerging from one's heart. With the previously explained ritual, one should lay out the outer maṇḍala.🔽 🔽The supreme friend of practice refers to the deity of the family of the principal deity, who is the supreme friend of practice.

original: de nas dum bu dang po las bshad pa'i thig gdab pa'i cho gas nang gi dkyil 'khor nor bu zur brgyad pa'i dbyibs can nor bu'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de nas dum bu dang po las bshad pa'i thig gdab pa'i cho gas nang gi dkyil 'khor nor bu zur brgyad pa'i dbyibs can nor bu'i ka ba brgyad dang ldan pa /
translated: Then, by the rite of laying out lines as explained in the first chapter, the inner mandala is an eight-sided jewel, endowed with eight jewel pillars,

original: rin po che'i myu gus yongs su bskor ba rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba dang rtse mo dang ldan ba'i thig legs par btab la /
analyzed: rin po che'i myu gus yongs su bskor ba rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba dang rtse mo dang ldan ba'i thig legs par btab la /
translated: completely surrounded by jewel sprouts, and endowed with a vajra-jewel fence and top.

original: de bzhin du khro bo'i lta bas sgo rnams bskyed la tshon rtsi dgye bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du khro bo'i lta bas sgo rnams bskyed la tshon rtsi dgye bar bya'o //
translated: Having laid out the lines well, in the same way, by the wrathful gaze, one should generate the doors and lay out the colors.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi nang du bcas pa'am /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi phyi nang du bcas pa'am /
translated: Either inside or outside the mandala,

original: de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi tshon rtsi sngon pos nam mkha'i me tog ltar sngo ba byas la nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar mas brgyan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sa gzhi tshon rtsi sngon pos nam mkha'i me tog ltar sngo ba byas la nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar mas brgyan par bya'o //
translated: one should make the ground of the inner mandala blue like the blue lotus flower, and adorn it with the sun, moon, and stars.

original: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po bee d'urya sna tshogs padma'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po bee d'urya sna tshogs padma'i steng du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: Then, in the center of the inner mandala, one should visualize Bhagavat Ākāśagarbha, who is seated in the bodhisattva posture upon a variegated lotus of beryl.

original: g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rang ngi thugs ka'i phyogs su rdo rje rin po che bsnams nas stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa la brtson pas phyag g-yas pas rin po che'i mchog stsol ga rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rang ngi thugs ka'i phyogs su rdo rje rin po che bsnams nas stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin pa la brtson pas phyag g-yas pas rin po che'i mchog stsol ga rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: He holds a vajra-jewel to his heart with his left hand in a precious fist, and with his right hand he bestows the gift of the supreme jewel, crowned with a precious crown.

original: 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs kun du 'khrug pa /
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs kun du 'khrug pa /
translated: He is ablaze with a mass of various light rays.

original: thugs rab tu dgyes pa'i tshul can dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: thugs rab tu dgyes pa'i tshul can dgod par bya'o //
translated: He is smiling, with a very joyful mind.

original: de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: de'i mdun du 'dod chags rdo rje ma'i gnas su dbang bskur ba'i rin po che'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba /
translated: In front of him, in the place of Rāgavajrā, one should visualize the precious crown of consecration,

original: phyag g-yas kyis rin po che'i cod pan bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas kyis rin po che'i cod pan bsnams pa /
translated: holding a precious crown in the right hand.

original: g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas gdan la bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs pa'o //
translated: He stands in the pose of standing with one foot extended on the seat with his left foot.

original: de'i g-yas logs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su gter rin po che /
analyzed: de'i g-yas logs su k'i li k'i la'i gnas su gter rin po che /
translated: To his right, in the abode of Kali Kali, is the treasure of jewels.

original: rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: He holds a jeweled vase.

original: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su nor bu chen po phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa g-yon pas rang gi thugs kar glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyab tu rdo rje dran pa'i gnas su nor bu chen po phyag g-yas pa na rdo rje rin po che bsnams pa g-yon pas rang gi thugs kar glegs bam bsnams pa'o //
translated: Behind him, in the abode of Vajrasmrti, is the great jewel. He holds a vajra jewel in his right hand and a book at his heart with his left hand.

original: g-yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su bla na med pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: g-yon du rdo rje bsnyems pa'i gnas su bla na med pa zhes bya ba /
translated: To his left, in the abode of Vajranarti, is the one called Anuttara.

original: phyag g-yon pa nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu bsnams nas dkur brten par bzhugs pa /🔽phyag @346a * //
analyzed: phyag g-yon pa nor bus mtshan pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje dril bu bsnams nas dkur brten par bzhugs pa / phyag @346a * //
translated: He stands with his left hand holding a bell marked with a jewel and a vajra cross at his hip.

original: g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs nor bu rang gi thugs kar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas rang gi thugs kar sna tshogs nor bu rang gi thugs kar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bzhugs pa'o //
translated: His right hand holds a multicolored jewel at his heart in the manner of holding a flower.

original: me'i mtshams su lha mo rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba'o //
analyzed: me'i mtshams su lha mo rnal 'byor ma zhes bya ba rin po che'i cod pan 'chang ba'o //
translated: In the southeast is the goddess called Yoginī, who wears a jeweled crown.

original: bden bral gyi mtshams su dpal mo rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: bden bral gyi mtshams su dpal mo rin po che'i bum pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: At the corner of the south, the glorious precious lady holds a vase.

original: rlung gi mtshams su lha mo shin tu phun sum tshogs ma zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang dbu rgyan bsnams nas bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung gi mtshams su lha mo shin tu phun sum tshogs ma zhes bya ba yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan dang dbu rgyan bsnams nas bzhugs pa'o //
translated: At the corner of the wind, the goddess called “Extremely Excellent” holds a wish-fulfilling jewel victory banner and a diadem.

original: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su lha mo mchod ma zhes bya ba rin po che'i gzhong zlum rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan cing bkang ba bsnams nas bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su lha mo mchod ma zhes bya ba rin po che'i gzhong zlum rgyan thams cad kyis yongs su brgyan cing bkang ba bsnams nas bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: At the corner of the Indra, the goddess called “Worship” holds a precious round plate filled with all ornaments.

original: rin po che'i sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin po che'i dril bu ma'i bar du ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po rang rang gi mtshan nor bus mtshan pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i sgeg mo la sogs pa nas rin po che'i dril bu ma'i bar du ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po rang rang gi mtshan nor bus mtshan pa thogs pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: The precious lady and so forth up to the precious bell should be drawn holding their own names marked with jewels as taught in the Vajrasattva maṇḍala.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i snying po bshad do //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa'i snying po bshad do //
translated: Then the essence of the Bhagavat Akasagarbha and so forth is taught.

original: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva:/
analyzed: aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva:/
translated: Oṃ, all vajra lords, consecrate me, bhur bhuvaḥ svāḥ.

original: badzra satva dza:/ badzra ratna h'um /
analyzed: badzra satva dza:/ badzra ratna h'um /
translated: Vajrasattva jaḥ, vajraratna hūṃ,

original: badzra dharm'a bam /
analyzed: badzra dharm'a bam /
translated: vajradharma vaṃ,

original: badzra karma ho:/ badzra aa bhi shinytsa ma h'a badzra ni dha ri h'um /
analyzed: badzra karma ho:/ badzra aa bhi shinytsa ma h'a badzra ni dha ri h'um /
translated: vajrakarma hoḥ, vajrāveśa maṃ, mahāvajra niḥsvabhāva hūṃ.

original: badzra ma ni ratna dhva dz'a gra ke y'u re bam ma h'a badzra ma he ho /
analyzed: badzra ma ni ratna dhva dz'a gra ke y'u re bam ma h'a badzra ma he ho /
translated: Vajramani ratnadhvaja agra keyūra vaṃ, mahāvajra mahe hoḥ.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po nas brtsams te /
translated: This is the essence of all the deities, beginning with the Blessed One Akṣobhya,

original: mchod pa'i lha mo'i bar gyi snying po yin no //
analyzed: mchod pa'i lha mo'i bar gyi snying po yin no //
translated: up to the offering goddesses.

original: 'di dag thams cad kyang mar gang dag cing rnyog pa med pa'i rigs can rdo rje rin chen gyi rang gi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rin po che'i mtshan ma bsnams pa sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis rab tu dgyes par bzhugs ma
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad kyang mar gang dag cing rnyog pa med pa'i rigs can rdo rje rin chen gyi rang gi cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba rin po che'i mtshan ma bsnams pa sna tshogs padma la sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis rab tu dgyes par bzhugs ma
translated: All of them are of the family of pure, stainless water, consecrated with their own crowns of the jewel vajra, holding the insignia of the jewel, seated in the cross-legged bodhisattva posture on variegated lotuses,

original: nam mkha'i snying po nas brtsams te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i snying po nas brtsams te /
translated: beginning with Akṣobhya,🔽up to the offering goddesses.

original: nor bu'i dril bu'i bar du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i dril bu'i bar du bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw it between the jewel and the bell.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas phyi dro'i dus su sngar bshad pa'i h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu ba dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas phyi dro'i dus su sngar bshad pa'i h'um mdzad kyi sbyor bas sgo dbye ba byas la bsdu ba dang mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa byas nas /
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala in that way, in the evening time one should open the door with the previously explained Hūṃkāra yoga, and having performed the gathering and the praise with the one hundred and eight names,

original: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i mdun du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po'i mdun du sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug ste /
translated: one should sit in the bodhisattva posture in front of the Bhagavat Akāśagarbha.

original: nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur rin po che'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang sngags 'dis bcom @346b ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur rin po che'i dril bu dang bcas pa'i g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu dang sngags 'dis bcom @346b ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o //
translated: With the jewel pledge fist with the right index finger hook and this mantra, one should induct the Bhagavat with his retinue into the maṇḍala:

original: aom bhu aa hi dza bhu ba pra thi sha h'um sva gri na pham ba batta siddhya tram /
analyzed: aom bhu aa hi dza bhu ba pra thi sha h'um sva gri na pham ba batta siddhya tram /
translated: Oṃ bhu aḥ hi bhuva pra tiṣ hu svā grīṇa phaṃ baṭṭa siddhyatra.

original: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas la /
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bgegs bsal ba la sogs pa byas la /
translated: Then, having cleared away obstructors with the jewel yakṣa pledge seal, and so on,

original: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcad de rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad go bgos la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo rnams bcad de rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad go bgos la 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i sngags kyis bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la mchod yon phul te rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub
translated: With the vajra fist block the doors, and having put on all the armor with the vajra armor, offer a libation to the Blessed One together with the retinue with the mantra of Noble Ākāśagarbha, and accomplish the Blessed One with one’s pledge seal.

original: par bya'o // aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva:/🔽dri shya sa ma ya stvam ham dza: h'um bam ho: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: par bya'o // aom sarba badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva:/ dri shya sa ma ya stvam ham dza: h'um bam ho: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti stvam aa bhi shinytsa mi bhur bhu ba sva: zhes lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
translated: Om, you are the lord of all vajras, I consecrate you, bhur bhuvaḥ svāḥ.🔽Say this three times.🔽Likewise, say vajra-ghanté hoḥ three times, and say:

original: de bzhin du badzra ghante ho: dri shya sa ma ya stvam sa ma yam stvam aa ham dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: de bzhin du badzra ghante ho: dri shya sa ma ya stvam sa ma yam stvam aa ham dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: “Be beheld, be true to your pledge, be true to your pledge, I am, jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: badzra ghante ho:/ zhes bya ba'i bar du lan gsum bzlas la /
analyzed: badzra ghante ho:/ zhes bya ba'i bar du lan gsum bzlas la /
translated: Vajra-ghanté hoḥ.”

original: bcom ldan 'das lha mo dril bu ma'i bar du rang gi dam tshig gis bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das lha mo dril bu ma'i bar du rang gi dam tshig gis bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: The Blessed One should be accomplished by the pledge of the goddess Ghaṇṭā.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa rnams chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas btab la /
translated: Then, the Blessed One together with the retinue should be sealed with the Dharma, action, and great seals.🔽Having conferred empowerment on the Blessed One together with the retinue with the empowerment of the vajra jewel seal, again offer a libation, and with the two precious fists arising from the two precious vases and as many flowers, etc.,

original: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbang bskur nas yang mchod yon phul la bum pa gang ba dang / ji snyed pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis las byung bas yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la dbang bskur nas yang mchod yon phul la bum pa gang ba dang / ji snyed pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i phyi'i mchod pa rnams dang rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa phyag rgya'i mchod pa bcu gnyis kyis rin po che'i khu tshur gnyis las byung bas yang dag par mchod la /
translated: and the twelve seal offerings such as the precious weapon, make offerings.

original: aom pa ra ma su kha aa sha ya sa su la li ta bi la sa na mi te ra na ma mam bha ga wa'antam dza: h'um pam ho:/
analyzed: aom pa ra ma su kha aa sha ya sa su la li ta bi la sa na mi te ra na ma mam bha ga wa'antam dza: h'um pam ho:/
translated: oṃ parama sukhāśaya sasau lalitavilasanamiteraṇamam bhagavān tam jaḥ hūṃ baṃ hoḥ

original: hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha ku su m'anydza li n'a tha zhes bya ba glu dang bcas pa zlos shing bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag byas la phyag bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: hi hi hi hi pra t'i tstsha ku su m'anydza li n'a tha zhes bya ba glu dang bcas pa zlos shing bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag byas la phyag bzhi bya'o //
translated: One should recite hi hi hi hi with a song, and having bowed one's head to the Blessed One, one should make four prostrations.

original: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye rig byas nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang 'dod pa'i rdo rje mas cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg byas la thab kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor 'di bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po zlos shing🔽me tog gis bzhugs su gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying @347a * //
analyzed: de nas phyi rol du gtor ma byin la nye rig byas nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang rdo rje me dang 'dod pa'i rdo rje mas cho ga bzhin du sbyin sreg byas la thab kyi dbus su dkyil 'khor 'di bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po zlos shing me tog gis bzhugs su gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi snying @347a * //
translated: Then, having given the bali outside and made the near-action, one should perform the fire sacrifice with the jewel yakṣa, vajra fire, and desire vajrī as prescribed. In the middle of the hearth, one should invite this maṇḍala of the Blessed One Ākāśagarbha,🔽reciting his essence mantra.

original: pos mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
analyzed: pos mar gyi sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo //
translated: Having invited him with flowers, one should offer one hundred and eight oblations of ghee with the essence mantra of the Blessed One.

original: lhag ma rnams la ni rang gi snying po zlos shing sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul lo //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams la ni rang gi snying po zlos shing sreg blugs bdun bdun dbul lo //
translated: For the remaining [deities], one should offer seven oblations each, reciting their own essence mantras.

original: de nas yang dkyil 'khor de me tog dang lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos shing bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu gyur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas yang dkyil 'khor de me tog dang lha thams cad kyi snying po zlos shing bris pa'i dkyil 'khor dang gcig tu gyur bar bsam mo //
translated: Then, reciting the essence mantra of the flower and all the deities, one should imagine that the mandala merges into one with the drawn mandala.

original: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa blangs la de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed nas rang gi snying gar rin po che bskyed la shar sgor bltas te phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la
analyzed: de nas phyag btsal ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa blangs la de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed nas rang gi snying gar rin po che bskyed la shar sgor bltas te phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus bdag nyid la
translated: Then, having performed the preliminary of prostrations, and so on, one should take the vows, and likewise generate the great mind of enlightenment. Having generated the jewel at one's heart, one should face the eastern door and, with the water of the vase that is outside,🔽consecrate oneself.

original: dbang bskur la rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: dbang bskur la rdo rje nor bu'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Binding the mudra of the vajra-jewel pledge fist,

original: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la 'jug pa'i glu len cing rdo rje nor bu'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba blangs la 'jug pa'i glu len cing rdo rje nor bu'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya'o //
translated: one should take up the flower garland with that very [fist], and, singing the song of entering, one should enter into the mandala of the vajra-jewel.

original: de nas 'di yin te /
analyzed: de nas 'di yin te /
translated: Then, this is it:

original: dbang phyug dam pa dbang bskur thams cad nyid //
analyzed: dbang phyug dam pa dbang bskur thams cad nyid //
translated: The supreme lord, all consecrations,

original: mi zad gter gyi dam pa legs grub mdzod //
analyzed: mi zad gter gyi dam pa legs grub mdzod //
translated: accomplish the excellent supreme inexhaustible treasure.

original: rgyal mdzad kun mchog rnam rgyal bsgreng mdzad pa //
analyzed: rgyal mdzad kun mchog rnam rgyal bsgreng mdzad pa //
translated: The Victorious One, the supreme of all victors, extends victory.

original: rdo rje rin chen dpal mchog mchog bdag mdzod //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen dpal mchog mchog bdag mdzod //
translated: The supreme jewel vajra is the supreme self of glory.

original: rin po che'i lcags kyu ma'i snying pos bdag nyid dgug par bya'o //🔽de nas de bzhin du rin po che'i snying po zlos shing lho phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che'i lcags kyu ma'i snying pos bdag nyid dgug par bya'o // de nas de bzhin du rin po che'i snying po zlos shing lho phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: With the essence of Ratnāṅkuśā, one should summon oneself.🔽Then, reciting the essence of Ratnamaṇi, one should enter through the southern door in the same way.

original: de nas rin po che lcags sgrog ma'i snying po zlos shing nub phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rin po che lcags sgrog ma'i snying po zlos shing nub phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting the essence of Ratnāṅkuśā, one should enter through the western door.

original: de nas de bzhin du rin po che dril bu ma'i snying po zlos shing byang phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du rin po che dril bu ma'i snying po zlos shing byang phyogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting the essence of Ratnapāśā, one should enter through the northern door in the same way.

original: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la aom pa ram su kha aa sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag byas la dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang shar phyogs kyi sgo nas zhugs la aom pa ram su kha aa sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa zlos shing bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag byas la dam tshig brjod par bya'o //
translated: Again, having entered through the eastern door, reciting Oṃ paraṃ sukhaṃ āśā and so forth, one should bow one's head to the Blessed One and recite the pledge.

original: khyod ni nam mkha' las byung bas //
analyzed: khyod ni nam mkha' las byung bas //
translated: You are born from space,

original: thams cad kyi ni mchog gyur yin //
analyzed: thams cad kyi ni mchog gyur yin //
translated: becoming the supreme of all.

original: aom siddha bhu ba siddha sva dha ma h'a badzra ratna bha ba trat tam /
analyzed: aom siddha bhu ba siddha sva dha ma h'a badzra ratna bha ba trat tam /
translated: Oṃ, accomplished earth, accomplished svadhā, great vajra jewel, be firm!

original: de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor la bskor ba lan gsum byas la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having circumambulated the maṇḍala three times, one should sit in front of the Blessed One and say this:

original: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
translated: Great desire, great bliss,

original: rdo rje chen po nor che ba //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po nor che ba //
translated: great vajra, great wealth,

original: ye shes chen po las che ba //
analyzed: ye shes chen po las che ba //
translated: great wisdom, great action,

original: rdo rje sems thog bdag grub mdzod //
analyzed: rdo rje sems thog bdag grub mdzod //
translated: accomplish for me the vajra mind.

original: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then one should say this:

original: dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: pra siddha mam /🔽de nas @347b rdo rje chu 'thung la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: pra siddha mam / de nas @347b rdo rje chu 'thung la aa zhes bya ba lan brgya zlos shing bdag nyid la dbab par bya'o //
translated: Prasiddha mam.🔽Then, having drunk the vajra water, one should cause it to descend upon oneself, repeating the syllable a one hundred times.

original: de nas g-yas pa'i khro bo khu tshur gyis rdo rje nor bu dral zhing a'a zhes bya ba 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang bcas pa lan brgya zlos shing dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas g-yas pa'i khro bo khu tshur gyis rdo rje nor bu dral zhing a'a zhes bya ba 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po dang bcas pa lan brgya zlos shing dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then, with the wrathful fist of the right hand, one should split the vajra jewel, and with the syllable a, together with Ākāśagarbha, one should cause it to descend one hundred times.

original: de ltar bdag nyid la dbab pa byas nas rang gi snying pos me tog dor bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bdag nyid la dbab pa byas nas rang gi snying pos me tog dor bar bya'o //
translated: Having thus caused the descent upon oneself, one should cast the flower with one’s essence.

original: des ni blangs te nam mkha'i snying po nyid kyis rang gi mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: des ni blangs te nam mkha'i snying po nyid kyis rang gi mgo bo la bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having taken it, Akashagarbha himself should bind it to one’s head.

original: de nas de nyid kyis dgong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de nyid kyis dgong g-yogs dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with that very [mantra], one should untie the blindfold.

original: de nas de nyid zlos shing dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de nyid zlos shing dkyil 'khor blta bar bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting that very [mantra], one should view the maṇḍala.

original: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jug pa'i phyag rgya bcings la tishtha badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the entrance seal, one should release it at one’s heart with “tiṣṭha vajra” and so forth.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la bsnyems pa dang bcas pas dbral bar 'jog pas lta ba'i rgyu bzhin du 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong bar stsal nas rang gi dngos grub🔽thams cad stsal bar mdzad pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la bsnyems pa dang bcas pas dbral bar 'jog pas lta ba'i rgyu bzhin du 'dzum pa dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing ji srid bcom ldan 'das kyis mthong bar stsal nas rang gi dngos grub🔽thams cad stsal bar mdzad pa de srid kyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the great seal of the Blessed One, one should gaze at the Blessed One with a smile, as if one were the cause of the viewing, placing it on one’s forehead with pride, and recite [the mantra] until the Blessed One grants one’s seeing and bestows all one’s accomplishments.

original: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor shis pa brjod pa'i tshul du rang gi snying gar bzhag la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa bya'o //
translated: Then, turning the vajra-palms around, one should place them at one’s heart in the manner of uttering an auspicious benediction, and one should praise the Blessed One with the one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: de nas rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Then, with the four secret offerings beginning with the Ratnolkā, one should make perfect offerings to the Blessed One.

original: bdag nyid dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i cho ga thams cad snga ma bzhin du rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should perform all the rites beginning with the consecration of oneself as before.

original: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
analyzed: slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga rdzogs so /
translated: The rite of the master’s acts is complete.

original: // / de nas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'byung ste /
analyzed: // / de nas slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga 'byung ste /
translated: Now the rite of inducting the disciples, etc., occurs.

original: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings nas //
analyzed: rdo rje mchod yon bskor bcings nas //
translated: Having bound the vajra-drinking water,

original: snying nas bsam pa thag pa yis //
analyzed: snying nas bsam pa thag pa yis //
translated: with a mind that is sincere from the heart,

original: mgo bos yang dag phyag bya ba //
analyzed: mgo bos yang dag phyag bya ba //
translated: one should make obeisance with one’s head

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin //🔽zhugs nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum ni //
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub byed yin // zhugs nas dkyil 'khor lan gsum ni //
translated: to the one who accomplishes all powers.🔽Having entered, one should circumambulate the maṇḍala three times

original: bskor ba byas nas brjod par bya //
analyzed: bskor ba byas nas brjod par bya //
translated: and recite the following:

original: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
analyzed: 'dod chags chen po bde ba che //
translated: Great passion, great bliss,

original: 'gro ba kun las 'grub par mdzod //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun las 'grub par mdzod //
translated: accomplish for me the attainment of all goals.

original: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
analyzed: de nas dus kyi mchod pa yis //
translated: Then, with the timely offering,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag mchod //🔽de bzhin nyid @348a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag mchod // de bzhin nyid @348a * //
translated: worship the Tathāgatas.

original: dbang rdo rje ni //
analyzed: dbang rdo rje ni //
translated: The vajra empowerment of suchness

original: bzung ste slob ma gzhug par bya'o //🔽de nas slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga'am /
analyzed: bzung ste slob ma gzhug par bya'o // de nas slob ma bslab pa'i gzhi lnga'am /
translated: should be grasped and the disciple admitted.🔽Then, the disciple, endowed with the five trainings,

original: dge tshul lam dge slong gi bslab pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag btsal la /🔽dga' chen bdag nyid ston pa bas //
analyzed: dge tshul lam dge slong gi bslab pa dang ldan pas slob dpon la phyag btsal la / dga' chen bdag nyid ston pa bas //
translated: or the training of a novice or monk, should bow to the master🔽and say, “I will worship the teacher, the great being,”

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
translated: and so forth.🔽Then, the disciple, with upper and lower garments completely enchanted with the jewel yakṣa, and with a cloth enchanted with the essence of the jewel yakṣa and the gate protectors, should be blindfolded, given a flower garland, and made to smell the scent.

original: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos kyis stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs la yang nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang sgo srung ma'i snying po bzlas pa'i dar gyis gdong g-yogs te me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang / kha dri zhim por yang byas la slob ma phyag bzhi byed du yang gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas nor bu'i gnod sbyin yongs su bzlas pa'i gos kyis stod g-yogs dang smad g-yogs la yang nor bu'i gnod sbyin dang sgo srung ma'i snying po bzlas pa'i dar gyis gdong g-yogs te me tog gi phreng ba btags pa dang / kha dri zhim por yang byas la slob ma phyag bzhi byed du yang gzhug go //
translated: He should also be made to perform four prostrations.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug go //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du rang gi dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug go //
translated: Then, as before, one should cause him to take one’s pledge.

original: de nas de bzhin du byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed du bcug la /
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du byang chub chen po'i sems bskyed du bcug la /
translated: Then, as before, one should cause him to generate the thought of great awakening.

original: g-yas pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la de'i snying gar bzhag nas /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i rin po che'i khu tshur gyis rdo rje rin po che blangs la de'i snying gar bzhag nas /
translated: Taking up the vajra gem with the right precious fist, one should place it on his heart.

original: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rin po che bskyed nas /🔽su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
analyzed: slob ma'i snying gar rdo rje rin po che bskyed nas / su ra te sa ma ya stvam ho /
translated: Having generated the vajra gem in the disciple’s heart,🔽one should say, “Surate samayastvam hoḥ /

original: badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra siddhi ya th'a su kham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: vajra siddhi yathā sukhaṃ.”

original: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
analyzed: de nas phyi rol na gnas pa'i bum pa'i chus dbang bskur la /
translated: Then, having conferred empowerment with the water of the vase that is outside,

original: yon gyi mchog blangs te /
analyzed: yon gyi mchog blangs te /
translated: one should take the best of gifts.

original: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas te 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bskyed de /
analyzed: 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas te 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po bskyed de /
translated: Having generated Ārya Ākāśagarbha with the pledge seal of Ārya Ākāśagarbha,

original: dang po'i rdo rjes badzra satva /
analyzed: dang po'i rdo rjes badzra satva /
translated: one should bless him with the first vajra, “Vajrasattva /

original: badzra ratna / badzra dharma /🔽badzra karma zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: badzra ratna / badzra dharma /🔽badzra karma zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Vajraratna / Vajradharma /🔽Vajrakarma.”

original: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa bcing du gzhug go /
analyzed: nor bu'i khu tshur gyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa bcing du gzhug go /
translated: The vajra fist should bind the pledge seal together with the flower.

original: // de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: // de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug la slob dpon 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug pa'o //
translated: With that very [seal], one should cause him to hold the flower garland, and then perform the rite of entering [the mandala] and the vajra leap.

original: de nas bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcug la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having entered, one should say this:

original: khyed ni nam mkha' las byung bas //
analyzed: khyed ni nam mkha' las byung bas //
translated: You have arisen from space,

original: thabs kun gyi ni mchog gyur yin //
analyzed: thabs kun gyi ni mchog gyur yin //
translated: and have become the supreme of all means.

original: aom siddha su siddhya ma h'a badzra ratna bha ba trat tram zhes slos shing de 'jug ba la sogs ba'i cho ga thams cad 'dir rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: aom siddha su siddhya ma h'a badzra ratna bha ba trat tram zhes slos shing de 'jug ba la sogs ba'i cho ga thams cad 'dir rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: Reciting Om Siddha Susiddhya Mahabhairava Ratna Bhavatra Tram, all the rites of entering and so forth should be performed here.

original: de ltar slob ma bcug nas dbang bskur te /
analyzed: de ltar slob ma bcug nas dbang bskur te /
translated: Thus, having caused the disciple to enter and conferred empowerment,

original: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub par bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa bsgrub par bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di brtan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: one should train him in the accomplishment of the doctrine seal and so forth.

original: de nas de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas de phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to stabilize that, [the Bhagavān] declares, Then, after that, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma @348b thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma @348b thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately after.

original: dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
analyzed: dbang bskur ba'i rjes thogs nyid la'o //
translated: Immediately after the consecration.

original: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu ste /
translated: “For that reason” means cause.

original: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed par chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas rgyu de'i phyir sgrub pa bshad do zhes bya'o //
analyzed: gang gi phyir sgrub par byed par chos kyi phyag rgya la sogs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bas rgyu de'i phyir sgrub pa bshad do zhes bya'o //
translated: Because the accomplishment would not occur without the Dharma seal, etc.

original: rdo rje rin chen ni nam mkha'i snying po ste de'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni dam pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen ni nam mkha'i snying po ste de'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni dam pa ste /
translated: The supreme seal of Vajraratna is the best.

original: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i mchog des dpag tu med pa bzlas pas 'grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'i mchog des dpag tu med pa bzlas pas 'grub ces bya'o //
translated: By reciting the supreme seal of Vajraratna, one accomplishes the immeasurable.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po zlos shing /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin can bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying po zlos shing /
translated: The Bhagavān Ākāśagarbha, whose nature is the wisdom equal to space,

original: zhes bya ba chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba chos kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the reciter, should accomplish the Dharma seal.

original: ji snyed pa yis rab tu grub //
analyzed: ji snyed pa yis rab tu grub //
translated: By however much, it is accomplished.

original: ces bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rgyan ji snyed pas rnam par brgyan pa la rab tu bsgrub pa'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po'i rgyan ji snyed pas rnam par brgyan pa la rab tu bsgrub pa'o //
translated: This is the accomplishment of the adornment of the noble Akashagarbha with all adornments.

original: 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: 'di yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
translated: This, etc. is easy to understand.

original: de ltar kun mchog grub pa yin //
analyzed: de ltar kun mchog grub pa yin //
translated: Thus, the supreme of all is accomplished.

original: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ji ltar grub pa de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa rnams ni chos kyi phyag rgyas bsgrubs pas kyang /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa ji ltar grub pa de bzhin du phyag rgya chen po dang dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa rnams ni chos kyi phyag rgyas bsgrubs pas kyang /
translated: This shows that just as it has been explained, the accomplishments of the great seal, pledge seal, doctrine seal, and action seal are accomplished by means of the doctrine seal,

original: kun gyi mchog dngos grub chen po rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: kun gyi mchog dngos grub chen po rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes ston to //
translated: and the supreme of all, the great powers, are accomplished.

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
translated: How is the great seal to be accomplished?

original: phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dga' ba'i bya bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: phyag rgya bsgrub pa ni dga' ba'i bya bas so zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: The text says, “The seal is accomplished by the performance of the delightful.”

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgrub pa ni rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The great seal is to be accomplished with a mind of great delight, is what is meant.

original: dam tshig sgrub pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i sems kyis bya ba de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: dam tshig sgrub pa yang de bzhin no zhes bya ba ni zhes bya ba ni ji ltar phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i sems kyis bya ba de bzhin du dam tshig gi phyag rgya yang sgrub pa po zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The pledge seal is accomplished in the same way.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod pas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la rin po che dam tshig gi khu tshur bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod pas cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la rin po che dam tshig gi khu tshur bcing bar bya'o //
translated: The pledge seal is accomplished by one who desires to accomplish the pledge seal, having performed all the rites, he should bind the jewel pledge fist.

original: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas pa bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Then, having bound the pledge seal of one's deity, one should recite the mantra, is what is meant.

original: de bzhin du las grub na zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de bzhin du las grub na zhes bya ba ni dga' ba'i bya ba las kyi phyag rgya bcings la bzlas brjod bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Similarly, if one desires to accomplish the action seal, one should bind the action seal of one's deity, and recite the mantra, is what is meant.

original: rab tu mchod cing zhes bya ba ni rin po che mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis @349a * //🔽bdag nyid dam mdun na bzhugs pa'i lha la yang dag par mchod de /
analyzed: rab tu mchod cing zhes bya ba ni rin po che mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis @349a * // bdag nyid dam mdun na bzhugs pa'i lha la yang dag par mchod de /
translated: and so forth.🔽 One should worship oneself or the deity in front,

original: de rnams yid kyis bdag gam lha la rgyun du mchod cing bsgrub par byas te /
analyzed: de rnams yid kyis bdag gam lha la rgyun du mchod cing bsgrub par byas te /
translated: and one should always worship and accomplish the deity in one's mind.

original: de ltar las kyi phyag rgyas dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar las kyi phyag rgyas dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one will attain the supreme power with the karmamudrā.

original: sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud do zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
