analyzed: sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud do zhes bya ba ni chos kyi phyag rgya dang phyag rgya chen po dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang las kyi phyag rgya ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: The great practice tantra is the mahāmudrā of the dharmamudrā, the mahāmudrā, the samayamudrā, and the karmamudrā.

original: de bsgrub pa ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
analyzed: de bsgrub pa ni sgrub pa chen po'o //
translated: The practice of that is the great practice.

original: de ltar ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
analyzed: de ltar ston par byed pa'i sgra'i tshogs ni rgyud do //
translated: The collection of words that teaches that is the tantra.

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te gnas dang bdag bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul la phyag bya ba la sogs pa rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun par byas nas rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa🔽bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston pa yin te gnas dang bdag bsrung ba byas nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor sprul la phyag bya ba la sogs pa rang gi nus pa dang rjes su mthun par byas nas rdo rje thal mo dang rdo rje bsdams pa bcing bar bya'o //
translated: This is what is being taught: having performed the protection of the place and oneself, one should emanate the mandala with the vajra wheel gesture, and having performed the homage and so forth in accordance with one’s ability, one should bind the vajra palms together and the vajra binding.

original: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje bsdams pa snying gar dral bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should unbind the vajra binding at the heart.

original: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la rang gi snying gar phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'bebs pa bskyed la rang gi snying gar phyag rgya dgrol bar byas nas /
translated: Then one should generate the vajra descent, and having untied the seal at one’s heart,

original: dam tshig gi khu tshur rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi khu tshur rdo rje bcing bar bya'o //
translated: one should bind the pledge fist with the vajra binding.

original: de nas sdig ba dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa rnams dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sdig ba dral ba'i phyag rgya bcings la sdig pa rnams dral bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should bind the seal of the extraction of evil and extract the evils.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba la rdo rje rin po che de'i dbus su rang gis snying po yid kyis bris la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar zla ba la rdo rje rin po che de'i dbus su rang gis snying po yid kyis bris la /
translated: Then, on a moon at one’s heart, one should mentally write the vajra jewel, and in its center one’s essence mantra.

original: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nyid yid la zlos shing chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting that mentally, one should meditate on the selflessness of all phenomena.

original: de nas snying po 'di nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su bsams la de dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa las rang gi sems zla ba'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snying po 'di nyid nam mkha'i phyogs su bsams la de dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug dang bcas pa las rang gi sems zla ba'i rnam par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, having visualized this essence in the direction of space, one should imagine one's mind in the form of a moon together with the sixteen vowels.

original: de'i steng du yang snying po ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ba bsam mo //
analyzed: de'i steng du yang snying po ka la sogs pa dang bcas pa la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis ba bsam mo //
translated: On top of that, one should imagine a second moon disk together with the essence and the ka and so forth.

original: yang de'i rang gi snying po dang bcas pa las dang po'i rdo rje de nyid rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa rang gi lha'i mtshan ma de'i dbus su bzlas bar bya ba'i snying po rnam par bsam ste /
analyzed: yang de'i rang gi snying po dang bcas pa las dang po'i rdo rje de nyid rdo rje rin chen la sogs pa rang gi lha'i mtshan ma de'i dbus su bzlas bar bya ba'i snying po rnam par bsam ste /
translated: Again, from that together with one's essence, one should imagine the first vajra, and in the middle of that, the sign of one's deity such as the vajra jewel, and the essence to be recited.

original: de nyid yid la zlos shing rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgoms te phyag rgya'i gzugs las nor bu'i rigs thams cad sprul la des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nor bu'i rigs kyi gzugs su bskyed de mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
analyzed: de nyid yid la zlos shing rang gi lha'i phyag rgya'i nga rgyal bsgoms te phyag rgya'i gzugs las nor bu'i rigs thams cad sprul la des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nor bu'i rigs kyi gzugs su bskyed de mchod pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
translated: Reciting that very [essence] mentally, one should meditate on the pride of one's deity's seal. From the form of the seal, one should emanate all the families of the jewel lineage. With that, one should generate all the world systems of the ten directions in the form of the jewel lineage, and with all offerings one should perfectly

original: mchod nas nor bu'i rigs chen po dkyil 'khor du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis @349b bkod de rang gi mtshan ma der yid kyis bcug la de yang sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la rdo rje sems dpa'
analyzed: mchod nas nor bu'i rigs chen po dkyil 'khor du bcug la dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis @349b bkod de rang gi mtshan ma der yid kyis bcug la de yang sems dpar byin gyis brlabs pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje sems dpar bdag nyid bsams la rdo rje sems dpa'
translated: Having made offerings, one should place the great jewel family in the maṇḍala, and having arranged it in the maṇḍala method, one should mentally place one’s sign there, and also bless it as a sattva.

original: de nyid du rang gi snying po zlos shing rang gi lha'i skur bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nyid du rang gi snying po zlos shing rang gi lha'i skur bsgoms la /
translated: Having visualized oneself as Vajrasattva, one should recite the essence mantra of Vajrasattva and meditate on one’s deity’s form.

original: ma h'a sa ma ya sa ta ha zhes brjod do //
analyzed: ma h'a sa ma ya sa ta ha zhes brjod do //
translated: One should recite “mahāsamayasattva hūṃ.”

original: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of one’s deity,

original: sa ma yo& ham zhes kyang brjod do //
analyzed: sa ma yo& ham zhes kyang brjod do //
translated: one should also recite “samayo’haṃ.”

original: de nas sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang / rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o / de nas de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i lcags kyu ma la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
analyzed: de nas sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes bya ba dang / rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang dbral ba dang lkog ma dang spyi bor byin gyis brlab par bya'o / de nas de bzhin du ye shes sems dpa' rin po che'i lcags kyu ma la sogs pas dgug pa dang /
translated: Then, just as before, one should summon the awareness beings with the hook of the jewel, etc.,🔽and cause them to enter, bind, and control them, and having formed the pledge seal of one’s deity, one should look at it while reciting “Drisya” at the end of one’s essence mantra.

original: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi lha dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te rang gi snying po'i mthar dri shya zhes zlos shing blta bar byas la sngar bshad pa'i spyan drangs ba'i phyag rgya rang gi snying po dang bcas pas rang gi lus la bcug la /
analyzed: gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la rang gi lha dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te rang gi snying po'i mthar dri shya zhes zlos shing blta bar byas la sngar bshad pa'i spyan drangs ba'i phyag rgya rang gi snying po dang bcas pas rang gi lus la bcug la /
translated: Then, with the seal of summoning explained previously together with one’s essence mantra, one should cause the awareness beings to enter one’s body.

original: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam aa ham dza: h'um bam ho:/
analyzed: rang gi lha'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la sa ma ya stvam zhes brjod cing 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la sa ma ya stvam aa ham dza: h'um bam ho:/
translated: Then, having formed the pledge seal of one’s deity, one should generate the mandala of light while reciting “Samaya stva” and “Samaya stva ham jham bam hoh.”

original: zhes bya ba'i mthar rang gi snying po dang bcas pa bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i mthar rang gi snying po dang bcas pa bzla bar bya'o //
translated: At the end of that, one should recite one’s essence mantra.

original: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po bcings la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas 'phags ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad bcug ste
analyzed: de nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po bcings la dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod cing yid kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i sbyor bas 'phags ba de kho na nyid bsdus pa las gsungs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad bcug ste
translated: Then, having formed the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal, one should say jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ, and with the mental gesture of “excellent,” one should, as taught in the Compendium of Principles, cause all buddhas to enter one’s body.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrubs nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas rdo rje rin po che dang bdag
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams kyis bsgrubs nas chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen pos rgyas btab la dang po'i rdo rje sems dpa' snga ma bzhin du byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya rnams kyis dbang bskur nas rdo rje rin po che dang bdag
translated: Having accomplished them with the pledge seals, one should seal them with the Dharma, Action, and Great Seal. Having blessed oneself as the original Vajrasattva as before, one should confer empowerment with the empowerment seals.

original: po dang ming gis dbang bskur ba blangs la /
analyzed: po dang ming gis dbang bskur ba blangs la /
translated: Having taken the vajra, jewel, lord, and name empowerments,

original: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang par bya'o //
analyzed: dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs blang par bya'o //
translated: one should take the spiritual powers and vajra conduct.

original: de nas rin po che'i ma chon cha ma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid la mchod la de kho na nyid dang chos dang las dang dam tshig bzung nas /
analyzed: de nas rin po che'i ma chon cha ma la sogs pas gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid la mchod la de kho na nyid dang chos dang las dang dam tshig bzung nas /
translated: Having taken up reality, the Dharma, the activities, and the commitments, one should recite:🔽“May I become just like you, O Vajra Heart,🔽the supreme lord of all great powers,

original: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po bdag po'i mchog / rdo rje snying khyod bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la /🔽rang @350a * //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog / dbang phyug chen po bdag po'i mchog / rdo rje snying khyod bdag gyur cig / ces brjod la / rang @350a * //
translated: the supreme lord of great lords.”🔽One should imagine a white vajra on one’s tongue and also imagine one’s essence.

original: gi lce la rdo rje dkar po bsam zhing rang gi snying po yang rnam par bsams la yang snying po der rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che bsams nas de nyid zlos shing ji srid zla ba gcig tsam lon pa de nyid kyi bar
analyzed: gi lce la rdo rje dkar po bsam zhing rang gi snying po yang rnam par bsams la yang snying po der rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che bsams nas de nyid zlos shing ji srid zla ba gcig tsam lon pa de nyid kyi bar
translated: Again, having imagined a jewel vajra in one’s heart, one should recite that essence mantra for as long as one month.

original: du nyin re bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: du nyin re bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on that every day.

original: de nas rang gi lta'i rgyan dang cha lugs dang 'dra bar byas la zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms te mthar mtshan thag bsgoms na nang par rang gi lha'i gzungs dang / ji skad du bshad pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas rang gi lta'i rgyan dang cha lugs dang 'dra bar byas la zla ba gcig tsam bsgoms te mthar mtshan thag bsgoms na nang par rang gi lha'i gzungs dang / ji skad du bshad pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates all night at the end, in the morning one will have the form of one’s deity and will possess the good qualities explained above.

original: gal te phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to accomplish the great seal,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /
translated: one should practice all the rites as explained.

original: phyag rgya chen po bcings te rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la rang gi lha'i snying po bsams la /
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bcings te rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che la rang gi lha'i snying po bsams la /
translated: Forming the great seal, one should visualize one’s deity’s essence at the jewel at one’s heart.

original: yid rab tu dga' bas de bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgoms la /
analyzed: yid rab tu dga' bas de bzhin du zla ba gcig tsam gyi bar du bsgoms la /
translated: With a very joyful mind, one should meditate in that way for about a month.

original: mthar zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na nang bar sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mthar zla ba nya la mtshan thog thag bsgoms na nang bar sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one meditates all night on the full moon at the end, in the morning one will attain the result explained above.

original: gal te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrubs na ni de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de lta bus ni sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrubs na ni de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te mthar mtshan thog thag bsgoms na de lta bus ni sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu thob bar 'gyur ro //
translated: If you are accomplishing the pledge seal, you should perform all the rites as before, bind the pledge seal, and meditate on it throughout the night. By that you will attain the results explained above.

original: gal te las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la /🔽rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas de'i steng du rang gi lha'i snying po bris la rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgyas bcings la ji
analyzed: gal te las kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du cho ga thams cad rjes su spyad la / rin po che'i mtshon cha ma la sogs pa'i mchod pa'i phyag rgya bcu gnyis kyis yang dag par mchod nas rang gi snying gar sna tshogs rdo rje bskyed nas de'i steng du rang gi lha'i snying po bris la rang gi lha'i las kyi phyag rgyas bcings la ji
translated: If you wish to accomplish the action seal, you should perform all the rites as before,

original: srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: srid mtshan ma thob par gyur pa de srid kyi bar du sngar bshad pa'i tshul gyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and make offerings with the twelve offering seals, such as the Ratnoṣṇīṣā. Then, generating a crossed vajra at your heart, write your deity’s essence mantra on it, bind the action seal of your deity, and meditate on it as before until you obtain the signs.

original: de nas de bzhin du zla ba nya ba'i dus su mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du zla ba nya ba'i dus su mtshan thog thag bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the same way, one should meditate throughout the night on the full moon.

original: de nas nang par sngar bshad pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'i rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: de nas nang par sngar bshad pa'i yon tan rnams dang ldan pa'i rdo rje snying po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro ;
translated: Then, in the morning, one will become like Vajra Essence, endowed with the qualities explained above.

original: / de ltar slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rnams bstan nas da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa nyid la slob dpon gyi las kyi bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir
analyzed: / de ltar slob ma gzhug pa la sogs pa'i las kyi cho ga rnams bstan nas da ni dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba thob pa nyid la slob dpon gyi las kyi bsgrub pa'i ye shes bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba'i cho ga bstan par bya ba'i phyir
translated: Having thus taught the rite of inducting the disciple and so forth, now, in order to teach the rite of the knowledge of the practice of the master's duties for one who has obtained the initiation and the commitments,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa yin te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then,” and so forth.

original: de @350b nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas pas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
analyzed: de @350b nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ston par byed pa'i tshig yin te sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas pas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
translated: The word “then” is a term indicating immediacy, [meaning] having performed the prior service, one accomplishes the desired aim by reciting throughout the night.

original: gang gi tshe 'grub par ma gyur pa de'i tshe rjes thogs nyid la 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ba yang yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'grub par ma gyur pa de'i tshe rjes thogs nyid la 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa la sogs pa'i las 'di dag thams cad rnal 'byor pas bsgrub par bya ba yang yin no //
translated: When that is not accomplished, then immediately after that, all the activities such as summoning all the gods, etc. should be accomplished by the yogī.
